Name: norton  deluxe  antivirus software for  devices and year subscription with automatic renewal includes secure vpn and password manager pcmaciosandroid activation code by email
Reviews: ive used norton for several years as it seems an ok product however norton as a company continues to engage in some of the most egregious business practices to catch out those who are less tech savvy so they are potentially and unwittingly hit with the full  at time of writing annual renewal fee or cajoled into paying for additional addonsthe prosin my time using norton my pc has never as far as im aware caught a virusit is easy to open and run a scanthe conswhere to begin  as many reviews state you should always deactivate the auto renewal and buy a new license key at a fraction of the cost unfortunately norton make activating a new key this way as labyrinthine as possible the online help will tell you to go to a settings page in your current installation of norton and put in the new key however if you have disabled auto renew this method will show an error code that will force you to log in to the main website here to activate your new key norton will insist that you enter your credit card details and enable auto renew before you then can  have to download a new install of the app that you already have installed on your pc before it will activate this also means you will lose any remaining time on your current norton install as it doesnt link the subscriptionsthe autorenewal  since i last installed this norton appear to have changed the fine print so that if you have deactivated the annual autorenewal  you also lose access to a number of features including the much vaunted virus protection promise ie if your pc does get a virusyou have no recourse to norton unless youve preagreed to let them charge you  next year in advance this makes no sense if you think about it if youre thinking all youll do is set a reminder to cancel the autorenewal a couple of weeks or a month before the renewal date norton have also changed the fine print to state that they will take the next payment  days in advance note that time period as its before you start getting popup reminders the popupsaddons  once installed you will be hit with constant pop ups trying to upsell additional features and addins or pseudocritical notifications in red  you have x broken registry entries fix now that if clicked will take you to a page asking you to confirm the purchase of said addon and they already have your credit card details from the setup process so again i can see how those less technically inclined can have unwitting added  on to their annual subscription without even realising you can turn these pop ups off but in reality they just seem to snooze eventually coming back after a few daysin summary yes the core product seems to work well enough but the fact i have to put so much active effort in to avoiding being ripped off or inadvertently charged additional costs makes me question nortons ethics and integrity as a company ultimately this will be the last time i  use them as there are alternatives out there and its at the point now where its easier to go with a different product each year than trying to navigate nortons renewal process

Name: norton  deluxe  antivirus software for  devices and year subscription with automatic renewal includes secure vpn and password manager pcmaciosandroid activation code by email
Reviews: ive used norton for several years as it seems an ok product however norton as a company continues to engage in some of the most egregious business practices to catch out those who are less tech savvy so they are potentially and unwittingly hit with the full  at time of writing annual renewal fee or cajoled into paying for additional addonsthe prosin my time using norton my pc has never as far as im aware caught a virusit is easy to open and run a scanthe conswhere to begin  as many reviews state you should always deactivate the auto renewal and buy a new license key at a fraction of the cost unfortunately norton make activating a new key this way as labyrinthine as possible the online help will tell you to go to a settings page in your current installation of norton and put in the new key however if you have disabled auto renew this method will show an error code that will force you to log in to the main website here to activate your new key norton will insist that you enter your credit card details and enable auto renew before you then can  have to download a new install of the app that you already have installed on your pc before it will activate this also means you will lose any remaining time on your current norton install as it doesnt link the subscriptionsthe autorenewal  since i last installed this norton appear to have changed the fine print so that if you have deactivated the annual autorenewal  you also lose access to a number of features including the much vaunted virus protection promise ie if your pc does get a virusyou have no recourse to norton unless youve preagreed to let them charge you  next year in advance this makes no sense if you think about it if youre thinking all youll do is set a reminder to cancel the autorenewal a couple of weeks or a month before the renewal date norton have also changed the fine print to state that they will take the next payment  days in advance note that time period as its before you start getting popup reminders the popupsaddons  once installed you will be hit with constant pop ups trying to upsell additional features and addins or pseudocritical notifications in red  you have x broken registry entries fix now that if clicked will take you to a page asking you to confirm the purchase of said addon and they already have your credit card details from the setup process so again i can see how those less technically inclined can have unwitting added  on to their annual subscription without even realising you can turn these pop ups off but in reality they just seem to snooze eventually coming back after a few daysin summary yes the core product seems to work well enough but the fact i have to put so much active effort in to avoiding being ripped off or inadvertently charged additional costs makes me question nortons ethics and integrity as a company ultimately this will be the last time i  use them as there are alternatives out there and its at the point now where its easier to go with a different product each year than trying to navigate nortons renewal process

Name: norton  deluxe  antivirus software for  devices and year subscription with automatic renewal includes secure vpn and password manager pcmaciosandroid activation code by email
Reviews: ive used norton for several years as it seems an ok product however norton as a company continues to engage in some of the most egregious business practices to catch out those who are less tech savvy so they are potentially and unwittingly hit with the full  at time of writing annual renewal fee or cajoled into paying for additional addonsthe prosin my time using norton my pc has never as far as im aware caught a virusit is easy to open and run a scanthe conswhere to begin  as many reviews state you should always deactivate the auto renewal and buy a new license key at a fraction of the cost unfortunately norton make activating a new key this way as labyrinthine as possible the online help will tell you to go to a settings page in your current installation of norton and put in the new key however if you have disabled auto renew this method will show an error code that will force you to log in to the main website here to activate your new key norton will insist that you enter your credit card details and enable auto renew before you then can  have to download a new install of the app that you already have installed on your pc before it will activate this also means you will lose any remaining time on your current norton install as it doesnt link the subscriptionsthe autorenewal  since i last installed this norton appear to have changed the fine print so that if you have deactivated the annual autorenewal  you also lose access to a number of features including the much vaunted virus protection promise ie if your pc does get a virusyou have no recourse to norton unless youve preagreed to let them charge you  next year in advance this makes no sense if you think about it if youre thinking all youll do is set a reminder to cancel the autorenewal a couple of weeks or a month before the renewal date norton have also changed the fine print to state that they will take the next payment  days in advance note that time period as its before you start getting popup reminders the popupsaddons  once installed you will be hit with constant pop ups trying to upsell additional features and addins or pseudocritical notifications in red  you have x broken registry entries fix now that if clicked will take you to a page asking you to confirm the purchase of said addon and they already have your credit card details from the setup process so again i can see how those less technically inclined can have unwitting added  on to their annual subscription without even realising you can turn these pop ups off but in reality they just seem to snooze eventually coming back after a few daysin summary yes the core product seems to work well enough but the fact i have to put so much active effort in to avoiding being ripped off or inadvertently charged additional costs makes me question nortons ethics and integrity as a company ultimately this will be the last time i  use them as there are alternatives out there and its at the point now where its easier to go with a different product each year than trying to navigate nortons renewal process

Name: bitdefender total security    device   year subscription  pcmac  activation code by post
Reviews: i never thought i would ever say that a program like bitdefender could be annoying  i had a paid version of kaspersky prior to bitdefender and that wasnt as annoying  bitdefender continually sends notifications asking me to turn on the vpn i get that they want to make more money but i already have surfshark so i aint interested and i cannot find a way to switch them off  secondly the other day i get a notification telling me my phone was at risk i go into bitdefender to run a scan after seeing another message saying we are aware of malware on your device  so i run a scan after which i get the message your device was clean no malware found but why dont you switch on our vpn its a bit like a cheap chinese knockoff program fairly regularly i get notifications about the vpn thing or some other stuff to try to get me to pay for paid add ons to the softwareanother annoying thing is that i am being asked to turn on scam alert so i pressed the button to turn it on and im informed that i need to authorise something in settings  theres a button which i need to click on and that supposedly will take me to the area in settings where i need to be be i do this and i am brought back to the original page which is telling me that scam alert needs to be turned on  this seems to be a neverending circle as it never gets me into settings  i report it and they want screenshot after screenshot after screenshot thats a whole story in itselfi want a security program to run in the background to not be intrusive unless there is a definite attack on my phone or my pc and to be able to switch certain areas on or off without going round and round in circlesi dont want it popping up all the time like a delboy salesman try to sell me something that i dont need or want  enough said

Name: bitdefender total security    device   year subscription  pcmac  activation code by post
Reviews: i never thought i would ever say that a program like bitdefender could be annoying  i had a paid version of kaspersky prior to bitdefender and that wasnt as annoying  bitdefender continually sends notifications asking me to turn on the vpn i get that they want to make more money but i already have surfshark so i aint interested and i cannot find a way to switch them off  secondly the other day i get a notification telling me my phone was at risk i go into bitdefender to run a scan after seeing another message saying we are aware of malware on your device  so i run a scan after which i get the message your device was clean no malware found but why dont you switch on our vpn its a bit like a cheap chinese knockoff program fairly regularly i get notifications about the vpn thing or some other stuff to try to get me to pay for paid add ons to the softwareanother annoying thing is that i am being asked to turn on scam alert so i pressed the button to turn it on and im informed that i need to authorise something in settings  theres a button which i need to click on and that supposedly will take me to the area in settings where i need to be be i do this and i am brought back to the original page which is telling me that scam alert needs to be turned on  this seems to be a neverending circle as it never gets me into settings  i report it and they want screenshot after screenshot after screenshot thats a whole story in itselfi want a security program to run in the background to not be intrusive unless there is a definite attack on my phone or my pc and to be able to switch certain areas on or off without going round and round in circlesi dont want it popping up all the time like a delboy salesman try to sell me something that i dont need or want  enough said

Name: norton  premium  utilities   antivirus  utility   devices  year subscription  automatic renewal secure vpn  password manager   device  pcmacmobile  activation code by email
Reviews: ive used norton for several years as it seems an ok product however norton as a company continues to engage in some of the most egregious business practices to catch out those who are less tech savvy so they are potentially and unwittingly hit with the full  at time of writing annual renewal fee or cajoled into paying for additional addonsthe prosin my time using norton my pc has never as far as im aware caught a virusit is easy to open and run a scanthe conswhere to begin  as many reviews state you should always deactivate the auto renewal and buy a new license key at a fraction of the cost unfortunately norton make activating a new key this way as labyrinthine as possible the online help will tell you to go to a settings page in your current installation of norton and put in the new key however if you have disabled auto renew this method will show an error code that will force you to log in to the main website here to activate your new key norton will insist that you enter your credit card details and enable auto renew before you then can  have to download a new install of the app that you already have installed on your pc before it will activate this also means you will lose any remaining time on your current norton install as it doesnt link the subscriptionsthe autorenewal  since i last installed this norton appear to have changed the fine print so that if you have deactivated the annual autorenewal  you also lose access to a number of features including the much vaunted virus protection promise ie if your pc does get a virusyou have no recourse to norton unless youve preagreed to let them charge you  next year in advance this makes no sense if you think about it if youre thinking all youll do is set a reminder to cancel the autorenewal a couple of weeks or a month before the renewal date norton have also changed the fine print to state that they will take the next payment  days in advance note that time period as its before you start getting popup reminders the popupsaddons  once installed you will be hit with constant pop ups trying to upsell additional features and addins or pseudocritical notifications in red  you have x broken registry entries fix now that if clicked will take you to a page asking you to confirm the purchase of said addon and they already have your credit card details from the setup process so again i can see how those less technically inclined can have unwitting added  on to their annual subscription without even realising you can turn these pop ups off but in reality they just seem to snooze eventually coming back after a few daysin summary yes the core product seems to work well enough but the fact i have to put so much active effort in to avoiding being ripped off or inadvertently charged additional costs makes me question nortons ethics and integrity as a company ultimately this will be the last time i  use them as there are alternatives out there and its at the point now where its easier to go with a different product each year than trying to navigate nortons renewal process

Name: norton  premium  utilities   antivirus  utility   devices  year subscription  automatic renewal secure vpn  password manager   device  pcmacmobile  activation code by email
Reviews: ive used norton for several years as it seems an ok product however norton as a company continues to engage in some of the most egregious business practices to catch out those who are less tech savvy so they are potentially and unwittingly hit with the full  at time of writing annual renewal fee or cajoled into paying for additional addonsthe prosin my time using norton my pc has never as far as im aware caught a virusit is easy to open and run a scanthe conswhere to begin  as many reviews state you should always deactivate the auto renewal and buy a new license key at a fraction of the cost unfortunately norton make activating a new key this way as labyrinthine as possible the online help will tell you to go to a settings page in your current installation of norton and put in the new key however if you have disabled auto renew this method will show an error code that will force you to log in to the main website here to activate your new key norton will insist that you enter your credit card details and enable auto renew before you then can  have to download a new install of the app that you already have installed on your pc before it will activate this also means you will lose any remaining time on your current norton install as it doesnt link the subscriptionsthe autorenewal  since i last installed this norton appear to have changed the fine print so that if you have deactivated the annual autorenewal  you also lose access to a number of features including the much vaunted virus protection promise ie if your pc does get a virusyou have no recourse to norton unless youve preagreed to let them charge you  next year in advance this makes no sense if you think about it if youre thinking all youll do is set a reminder to cancel the autorenewal a couple of weeks or a month before the renewal date norton have also changed the fine print to state that they will take the next payment  days in advance note that time period as its before you start getting popup reminders the popupsaddons  once installed you will be hit with constant pop ups trying to upsell additional features and addins or pseudocritical notifications in red  you have x broken registry entries fix now that if clicked will take you to a page asking you to confirm the purchase of said addon and they already have your credit card details from the setup process so again i can see how those less technically inclined can have unwitting added  on to their annual subscription without even realising you can turn these pop ups off but in reality they just seem to snooze eventually coming back after a few daysin summary yes the core product seems to work well enough but the fact i have to put so much active effort in to avoiding being ripped off or inadvertently charged additional costs makes me question nortons ethics and integrity as a company ultimately this will be the last time i  use them as there are alternatives out there and its at the point now where its easier to go with a different product each year than trying to navigate nortons renewal process

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: been sipping on talisker skye single malt scotch whisky recently and its a real journey for the taste buds heres my takearoma  a whiff of the searight off the bat the aroma is intriguing its got this maritime quality to it like a fresh sea breeze mixed with a hint of smoky peat definitely sets the scene for whats to cometaste  peat with a sweet twistthe first sip hits you with that classic talisker peat but its not overwhelming theres a sweet undercurrent  think caramel and ripe fruits  that balances the smokiness beautifully its smooth with a slight spicy kick at the endfinish  lingering and warmthe finish is where this whisky really shines it leaves a warm smoky taste that lingers pleasantly inviting you back for another sippackaging  classy and understatedthe bottle is pretty sleek with a label thats straightforward and classy looks good on the shelf and gives off a vibe of qualityprice  good value for the experiencefor the quality of whisky youre getting the price feels about right its not the cheapest single malt out there but its reasonably priced for what it offersoverall  a musttry for whisky fansif youre into your single malts and havent tried talisker skye yet its definitely worth a go its a great example of what the isle of skye has to offer  a whisky with character warmth and a little bit of island magicso pour yourself a dram sit back and enjoy the ride

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: not like the  year malt but nice and a lot cheaper

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: i absolutely love talisker  so much so that i ask my wife to hide it as my once a week treatand boy do i look forward to it  i love the sweetness and richness of it along with the texture its just wonderful  i personally dont get much smoke on the palateon the nose yes  this just adds to the experience and has taken top spot on my whisky list  great stuff

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: it was a good price  my friend likes nice expensive whiskey  i cannot comment on the taste because i hate whiskey and i have an intolerance to all alcohol so even if i wanted to i could not ever drink it  but my friend absolutely loves it  hahaha so so that is why i have given it five stars  apparently it tastes very nice

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: i like peaty whisky this has a subtle smokiness to it and is easy to drink with a bit of ice

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: talisker classic is my favourite brand of single malt whisky this was an amazing price giving me a chance to try the skye option which was just as smoky and deliciously peatya real connoisseurs choice  at an offer price it would have been mad to refuse

Reviews: bought on offer and was very drinkable for an odd nightcap   particularly enjoyed the peaty aroma

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: a nice change

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: been sipping on talisker skye single malt scotch whisky recently and its a real journey for the taste buds heres my takearoma  a whiff of the searight off the bat the aroma is intriguing its got this maritime quality to it like a fresh sea breeze mixed with a hint of smoky peat definitely sets the scene for whats to cometaste  peat with a sweet twistthe first sip hits you with that classic talisker peat but its not overwhelming theres a sweet undercurrent  think caramel and ripe fruits  that balances the smokiness beautifully its smooth with a slight spicy kick at the endfinish  lingering and warmthe finish is where this whisky really shines it leaves a warm smoky taste that lingers pleasantly inviting you back for another sippackaging  classy and understatedthe bottle is pretty sleek with a label thats straightforward and classy looks good on the shelf and gives off a vibe of qualityprice  good value for the experiencefor the quality of whisky youre getting the price feels about right its not the cheapest single malt out there but its reasonably priced for what it offersoverall  a musttry for whisky fansif youre into your single malts and havent tried talisker skye yet its definitely worth a go its a great example of what the isle of skye has to offer  a whisky with character warmth and a little bit of island magicso pour yourself a dram sit back and enjoy the ride

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: not like the  year malt but nice and a lot cheaper

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: i absolutely love talisker  so much so that i ask my wife to hide it as my once a week treatand boy do i look forward to it  i love the sweetness and richness of it along with the texture its just wonderful  i personally dont get much smoke on the palateon the nose yes  this just adds to the experience and has taken top spot on my whisky list  great stuff

Name: talisker skye single malt scotch whisky   vol  cl  scottish whisky with fresh citrus bursts  underlying sweetness  peated  smoky single malt whisky  made by the sea
Reviews: it was a good price  my friend likes nice expensive whiskey  i cannot comment on the taste because i hate whiskey and i have an intolerance to all alcohol so even if i wanted to i could not ever drink it  but my friend absolutely loves it  hahaha so so that is why i have given it five stars  apparently it tastes very nice

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: i am a big fan of a dark and stormy  a generous measure of kraken into a fiery ginger beer garnished with lime  a litre bottle means more dark and stormies so thats automatically a good thingit is also regularly discounted so can be a real bargain on here  my favourite spiced rum in a decently sized bottle is always a five star review

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: i got this one at a great price in the salei like kraken rum like vanilla and black cherry so it seemed an ideal combination  happy to confirm that it really is its lovely  goes down smoothly on some ice  very tasty

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: fantastic alternative rum to some more well known brands bit i am told it is fantastic and quite unique taste but very well worth trying

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: spiced and tastyvery nice bootlevery rich tasty

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: i like a quality rum even though im not a frequent drinker  more of a tippler if the word exists and my previous purchase of woods rum was i thought my favourite but this is a different flavour altogether and even more palatable id say its now become my new favourite particularly as its a litre bottle and was at a good price when i bought it its a pity the price increased by almost  a few days after as id have bought another for the future but glad i got a bargain

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: very smooth rum and the combination of black cheery and vanilla gives it marzipanlike aftertaste i was not sure initially but this is growing on me and works extremely well with fresh mangoapple juice and soda water or smoothies  i do love me some rumsmoothie combo

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: tastes lovely drank it in  sitting so close to ml a go which is not much considering  shots in total over like a  hour period with coke felt more drunk than i have ever felt in my life i actually thought i had been poisoned and was going to die im guessing i had an allergic reaction to one of the ingredients as i have drank normal kraken for years and never felt bad happened each time the same struggling to standwalk felt like i was  again and couldnt handle my alcohol was very unsettling

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: this was the first time ordering alcohol online  i was a bit sceptical as was half expecting it smashed  however it was very well packaged and would have been hard to smashbought as a gift for my brother who loves this drink  not my type of tipple though

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: i tried kracken at a beer festival a few years ago and said id buy it but fast forward to the end of  to early  ive finally got round to buying this and the black cherry onei can honestly say they both pack a punchthis variety of kracken is best served over ice with either vanilla or normal coke a shot in a glass of irish liquor over ice or even a teaspoon in a cuppa coffeefor me i have to say ive tried a few coffee based liquors however this is my ultimate favourite

Name: kraken black cherry and madagascan vanilla black spiced rum cl
Reviews: now my favourite rum and only gets better when it is on offer

Name: three barrels rare old french brandy vsop cl
Reviews: have used kaspersky security year on year and my devices have had perfect protection great value for money and easy to install using the code purchased never experienced any problems

Name: three barrels rare old french brandy vsop cl
Reviews: always get it from amazon never auto renewal or purchase directly from kaspersky as they always charge you more

Name: three barrels rare old french brandy vsop cl
Reviews: kaspersky total security is my favourite of the all in one security packages and this is my th year using it always uninstall and buy digitally from amazon  its about  the price of renewingnot much has changed this year  same great product with a slightly very slightly updated user interface new this year so far seems to be an improved software updater thats a nice touchreason i use this is that it regularly scores highest on malware tests and as a bonus comes with actually useful tools like webcam blocker the update checker privacy and security optimisation browser plugins and such and is very light on system resources  i dont need to turn it off to game for example ive bought a couple of computers that have come with trials of norton or trend micro and the just feel sub par by comparisonminus  star from a perfect  for continuing to bundle kasperskys overpriced vpn software trial and dumb region locking the vpn can be removed post install by searching add or remove programs but the region locking seemed particularly lazyi didnt notice when i bought this that it was uk only  thats my bad it says right on the page  but kasperskys enforcement is very lazy im currently in australia but bought from the uk as my kaspersky account and payment card are still ukbased it let me activate that serial fine so no refund possibility but then wouldnt activate the software once downloaded even though the last one worked fine until the day before lol they know my account my history my hardware etc it should work better however all good as activated fine when using a vpn and no problems since with the vpn turned off

Reviews: kaspersky total security is my favourite of the all in one security packages and this is my th year using it always uninstall and buy digitally from amazon  its about  the price of renewingnot much has changed this year  same great product with a slightly very slightly updated user interface new this year so far seems to be an improved software updater thats a nice touchreason i use this is that it regularly scores highest on malware tests and as a bonus comes with actually useful tools like webcam blocker the update checker privacy and security optimisation browser plugins and such and is very light on system resources  i dont need to turn it off to game for example ive bought a couple of computers that have come with trials of norton or trend micro and the just feel sub par by comparisonminus  star from a perfect  for continuing to bundle kasperskys overpriced vpn software trial and dumb region locking the vpn can be removed post install by searching add or remove programs but the region locking seemed particularly lazyi didnt notice when i bought this that it was uk only  thats my bad it says right on the page  but kasperskys enforcement is very lazy im currently in australia but bought from the uk as my kaspersky account and payment card are still ukbased it let me activate that serial fine so no refund possibility but then wouldnt activate the software once downloaded even though the last one worked fine until the day before lol they know my account my history my hardware etc it should work better however all good as activated fine when using a vpn and no problems since with the vpn turned off

Name: buffalo trace kentucky straight bourbon whiskey cl abv   ideal partner in old fashioned cocktail
Reviews: i actually think this is one of the best spirits out there price wise for me its at the top it hits the right notes the hint of vanilla slight charred oak finish a smoothness that lingers ive even had the pricier stuff from the buffalo trace distillery and although theyre also phenomal they just get out classed due to the price ratiofor a bit extra fun when ever i drink scotch i always compare it to buffalo trace being from the uk i have easy access to very good scotch in any average bar i have yet still to find something that beats this whisky whiskey to my american friends

Reviews: ive tried a number of bourbons and this is the first one ive found nice  jack daniels tastes just mouldy to me  this had a variety of levels of flavour and is reviewed well by bourbon experts  its very much like a more expensive drink  smooth and slightly sweet from the corn

Name: buffalo trace kentucky straight bourbon whiskey cl abv   ideal partner in old fashioned cocktail
Reviews: taste has really grown on me like to drink a little of this neat of an evening and at first i wasnt too taken with it after last drinking bulleit bourbon this at  came over a little more strong tasting bulleit was  but now getting different taste experience with this and even prefer this slightly if anything would buy again and is nice to drink straight not yet tried mixed but i am peculiar with whisky not really liking with american lemonade or water would recommend and buy again if on offer

Reviews: this cl bottle of  years old single malt scotch whisky is very tasty i must admit the bottle and packaging looks really nice and it could be perfect as a gift for someone whos like whiskeygreat quality at all good value for moneyrecommended

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: a very nice and smooth whiskey good flavour not too strong but strong enough great quality would recommend

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: a smooth easy drinking great value malt from the far north of scotland that is one of my go to favourites

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: lovely tasting malt  slightly salty flavour  fantastic price compared to supermarket

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: full disclosure this review might be a bit biased because old pulteney  years happens to be my absolute favourite whiskey its wellbalanced and easydrinking nature coupled with the delightful notes of honey citrus and a subtle maritime influence make each sip an incredibly enjoyable experience the  years of aging truly shine through adding a depth and complexity that i find unparalleled for fellow enthusiasts who appreciate a finely crafted and timehonored scotch whisky old pulteney  year is a musttry and dare i say a musthave in any collection cheers to savoring moments with this exceptional dram

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: love this malt this is a smooth highland malt similar to a speyside as opposed to a peatiy islay lovely just to sit back and sip on a dram of this and if youre partial to something sweet now and again try the liqueur version stroma simply the best malt

Name: old pulteney  years old single malt scotch whisky cl
Reviews: i was worried about the bottle smashing during transit but i shouldnt have been very robust cardboard box i tasted this whisky years ago and the name has always stuck in my head wonderfully smooth taste i cannot stress that enough very underestimated brand that afterburn you get from cheap blended stuff which puts people off whisky in the long run is not an issue with this really cool eccentric bottle which resembles a still best served with ice very good value for money a great present for family or just treat yourself i am going back for another glass now

Name: woodford reserve bourbon whiskey cl
Reviews: excellent burbon goes well with a mixer or can be drunk straight nice and smooth a real step up from jack i prefer it with ginger and lime

Name: woodford reserve bourbon whiskey cl
Reviews: this is a really nice whisky good flavour and taste cheaper here than most supermarkets  made a good gift for my friends so will buy again

Name: woodford reserve bourbon whiskey cl
Reviews: nom nom nom a wonderful gentle flavour for casual consumption on a freezing cold eveningi had a sample and decided that this is the first bourbon which i found acceptable cannot stand the market leadersi prefer real scotch but this is a gentle flavour a great aroma smooth on the nose and the palette i do like a single ice cube as i prefer my spirits cold have lived in a few desertsthis also soothed my sore throat after hollering instructions all day on a freezing cold steam trainheaven

Name: woodford reserve bourbon whiskey cl
Reviews: bought this for old fashion cocktail best bourbon in my opinion for this great price  packaging was excellent disptached promptly but delivery delayed but no fault of supplier excelent buy will buy again

Name: woodford reserve bourbon whiskey cl
Reviews: im a scotch lover with a particular penchant for the islay offerings so bourbon is a fairly new world to me that said id like to hope my palate is developed enough that i can pick up on a good amount of the tasting notes in a whiskywoodford reserve has such a stunning reputation and seems to be regarded as one of the top bourbons especially at this price point if im being brutally honest i really dont see what all the fuss is about its not an unpleasant drink by any means its just entirely uninspiring my first foray into bourbon was buffalo trace which i loved and it showed me just how much better american whisky can be than the typical jack daniels no  which i find absolutely disgusting after that i tried bulleit which was incredible too such a shame that ive heard woodford touted above these two so many times and it ended up being such a let downnose vanilla vanilla and more vanilla i honestly get barely anything else except maybe the tiniest hint of bananapalate theres that vanilla again but this time a little toffee creeps in along with the classic oak bed bourbons are so often built on theres a faint bit of chocolate and that banana from the nose again as well as something not unlike tobacco again incredibly faint and a little flat its very smooth but there is quite the burn leading into the finish a couple of drops of water might well help but the other  flavours are so faint im afraid theyll end up lost entirelyfinish this is where i have to give credit the finish is completely butterscotch and very very long it takes me back to my childhood when my grandmother would share her werthers originals with me and that is what this finish is full of its just a shame the lead up to it was so average and there was such a bite on the end of a smooth palate that i had to get over before reaching itall in all an okay bourbon but in my personal opinion one that doesnt warrant half the praise it receives maybe i need to try more bourbons and go back to it with more experience this is a  star whisky in nose and taste to me but the finish was so long and provoked such an emotive response from me that i had to add a star that said id skip this one and give bulleit a try instead

Name: andrex gentle clean toilet rolls   toilet roll pack  bulk buy toilet rolls  gentle and soft on your familys skin  dermatologically tested
Reviews: i recently purchased andrex gentle clean toilet rolls and have been very pleased with their quality one of the most noticeable features of this product is its balance between softness and strength the toilet paper is gentle on the skin which is particularly important for those with sensitive skin yet its strong enough to be effective for its intended usethe rolls are also quite absorbent which means you can use less per visit making them economical in the long run this is a significant benefit especially when trying to manage household expensesin terms of environmental consciousness andrexs commitment to sustainability is commendable knowing that the product is made from sustainable sources and that the company is environmentally responsible adds an additional layer of satisfaction to the purchasethe packaging of the product is straightforward and easy to open and the rolls are a good size fitting well in standard holders the texture of the toilet paper with its embossed pattern not only adds to its effectiveness but also gives it a premium feeloverall andrex gentle clean toilet rolls offer great value for their price they deliver on comfort and functionality without compromising on quality i would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a reliable skinfriendly and ecoconscious toilet paper option

Reviews: indulge in the ultimate comfort and care with the andrex gentle clean toilet rolls this bulk pack of  toilet rolls ensures that your familys bathroom needs are well taken care of providing a soft and gentle experience for everyonekey featuresgentle and soft the andrex gentle clean toilet rolls are specially designed to be gentle on the skin providing a soft and luxurious feel with every usepack bulk buy with  rolls in a pack you wont have to worry about running out of toilet rolls anytime soon making it a costeffective and convenient choice for your householdhighquality paper these toilet rolls are made from highquality paper ensuring durability and strength while maintaining their gentle texturefamilyfriendly the gentle and soft nature of these toilet rolls makes them perfect for the whole family from young children to adultsdermatologically tested the andrex gentle clean toilet rolls are dermatologically tested ensuring they are safe and suitable for all skin types even for sensitive skinquick absorption the paper is designed to absorb quickly and effectively providing a clean and hygienic experience with every usetrusted brand andrex is a wellknown and trusted brand when it comes to toilet rolls ensuring you get the best quality for your familyconvenient packaging the bulk pack is easy to store and access making it a hasslefree addition to your bathroom suppliesexperience the ultimate softness and care with andrex gentle clean toilet rolls with  rolls in a pack you can be confident that your familys bathroom needs will be met comfortably and conveniently say goodbye to rough and uncomfortable toilet rolls and embrace the gentle and soft touch of andrex for a luxurious bathroom experience every time

Name: andrex gentle clean toilet rolls   toilet roll pack  bulk buy toilet rolls  gentle and soft on your familys skin  dermatologically tested
Reviews: ive always used andrex as for me they have always been the best when you weigh up the price and performance you get for that price by performace i mean how absorbent the tissue is and the thickness so that it doesnt tear easilythe great thing by getting them on amazon is that you can buy the really large packs and multiples of them so you get the best value for money and you dont have to worry about whether they will fit in your car or not because these get delivered to your doorstep  and for free if you are a prime member like i amamazons price for these is excellent and it worts out cheaper than the supermarkets that combined with the fact that you dont have to worry about carrying these large packs home makes amazon the ideal place to buy theseas mentioned earlier the andrex toilet rolls are really good but the reason why i only gave these  stars instead of  is because over time it looks like the manufacturer has reduced the actual size of the rolls so that you end up with less toilet paper on them i can remember the rolls being a lot thicker in the past but nowadays it looks like most manufacturers are trying to scrimp and save whereever they can hence the reason for me giving these  stars

Name: andrex gentle clean toilet rolls   toilet roll pack  bulk buy toilet rolls  gentle and soft on your familys skin  dermatologically tested
Reviews: this is the second time i have made the mistake of buying the wrong andrex  i didnt want the gentle clean puppies on a roll type i wanted the traditional  the first time was recently with a supermarket purchase  andrex are producing so many different types of toilet roll but they are all good valuei have tried some of the other types including the aloe vera ones for when i have visitors of the feminine kindeven though i purchased the wrong type again i do not mind as this puppies on a roll andrex is good quality soft and absorbant  the reason i do prefer the traditional one is supermarket purchase  andrex are producing so many different types of toilet roll but they are all good valuei have tried some of the other types including the aloe vera ones for when i have visitors of the feminine kindeven though i purchased the wrong type again i do not mind as this puppies on a roll andrex is good quality soft and absorbant  the reason i do prefer the traditional one is because the traditional one is also a good all rounder and can be used as kitchen roll cleaning windows etc  anything tissue paper does the traditional one is good atthis pack of  rolls is good value for money as even when andrex is on offer in the supermarkets one cant find  rolls for this pricenow for the bit where some buyers are complaining that these are not real andrex they are fake they are shorter smaller than the ones they normally buy etc  sorry to say but they are wrong  these rolls have not changed in size or thickness  this is the standard size for the gentle clean puppies on a roll paper  the ones i actually wanted before making the same error again are the traditional ones and they do have more paper on them and the sheets are larger but for this type of andrex it is the correct size  the paper is actually softer than the traditional paper and that is where the smaller size comes into play  this is more costly to produce  people claiming it is fake or andrex have downsized etc can just as easily buy much more newspaper for the same price but they certainly will not get the softness with it  these are the genuine andrex gentle clean rolls and they have not been downsizedi am highly recommending this  pack of andrex gentle clean puppies on a roll as it is much better quality than the traditional one it is much softer and so it is highly suitable for the bathroom  wc  its just not quite as good for some other uses such as cleaning windows as the fibres come loose and stick to the window

Reviews: when it comes to bathroom essentials nothing quite compares to the comfort and quality of andrex gentle clean toilet rolls after using these rolls for an extended period i can confidently say that they offer an exceptional bathroom experience that stands head and shoulders above the restsoftness that surpasses expectationsone of the first things that struck me about andrex gentle clean toilet rolls is their remarkable softness from the moment you touch the paper you can feel the difference its incredibly gentle on the skin making every bathroom visit a truly comforting experience the delicate texture is perfect for those with sensitive skin as it minimizes irritation and discomfortstrength and durabilitydespite their gentle nature these toilet rolls are impressively strong and durable you wont have to worry about unexpected rips or tears ensuring a hasslefree experience every time you use them the thickness of the sheets provides an extra layer of confidence that the paper unsatisfied or uncomfortablethoughtful packagingi appreciate the attention to detail in the packaging of andrex gentle clean toilet rolls the rolls are neatly packaged making them easy to store and ensuring they stay clean and hygienic until use the subtle design on the packaging adds a touch of elegance to my bathroomenvironmentally conscious choiceas someone who cares about the environment im pleased to know that andrex is committed to sustainability these toilet rolls are made with responsibly sourced materials and the brand actively works toward reducing its environmental impact choosing andrex gentle clean toilet rolls means making a responsible choice for the planet without compromising on qualityin conclusion andrex gentle clean toilet rolls have proven themselves to be a toptier uncomfortable bathroom visits and hello to pure indulgent softness

Reviews: i recently purchased andrex gentle clean toilet rolls and have been very pleased with their quality one of the most noticeable features of this product is its balance between softness and strength the toilet paper is gentle on the skin which is particularly important for those with sensitive skin yet its strong enough to be effective for its intended usethe rolls are also quite absorbent which means you can use less per visit making them economical in the long run this is a significant benefit especially when trying to manage household expensesin terms of environmental consciousness andrexs commitment to sustainability is commendable knowing that the product is made from sustainable sources and that the company is environmentally responsible adds an additional layer of satisfaction to the purchasethe packaging of the product is straightforward and easy to open and the rolls are a good size fitting well in standard holders the texture of the toilet paper with its embossed pattern not only adds to its effectiveness but also gives it a premium feeloverall andrex gentle clean toilet rolls offer great value for their price they deliver on comfort and functionality without compromising on quality i would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a reliable skinfriendly and ecoconscious toilet paper option

Name: andrex gentle clean toilet rolls   toilet roll pack  bulk buy toilet rolls  gentle and soft on your familys skin  dermatologically tested
Reviews: ive always used andrex as for me they have always been the best when you weigh up the price and performance you get for that price by performace i mean how absorbent the tissue is and the thickness so that it doesnt tear easilythe great thing by getting them on amazon is that you can buy the really large packs and multiples of them so you get the best value for money and you dont have to worry about whether they will fit in your car or not because these get delivered to your doorstep  and for free if you are a prime member like i amamazons price for these is excellent and it worts out cheaper than the supermarkets that combined with the fact that you dont have to worry about carrying these large packs home makes amazon the ideal place to buy theseas mentioned earlier the andrex toilet rolls are really good but the reason why i only gave these  stars instead of  is because over time it looks like the manufacturer has reduced the actual size of the rolls so that you end up with less toilet paper on them i can remember the rolls being a lot thicker in the past but nowadays it looks like most manufacturers are trying to scrimp and save whereever they can hence the reason for me giving these  stars

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: good litter cat seems to like using it i have a mat under the tray to catch the odd bit that comes off on the cats feet it seems to hold the smell although i do replace frequently not too expensive for a large bag

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: really good product been buying cheap litter for years and always had an issue with odours not with this one though doesnt clump together meaning you can easily scoop out solids and is very long lasting because of not having to constantly remove large amounts of clumped litter so actually works out cheaper in the long run

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: very absorbent doesnt all clump into a lump  reduces odour  not noticed any cat wee smell and we have three litter trays dotted around the house for two very young kittens we all know cat wee is a horrible strong odour highly recommend

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: excellent product worth the extra cost to me as i have copd so this saves a lot of tiring effort for me however unfortunately the company used hermes to deliver  my local evri agent will not ring the front door bell but instead insists on going past the front door and bell round the side of the house and leaving packages whatever the weather round there for me to discover sometimes days later  this time i found the package but its too heavy for me to carry to my door so ill have to wait for someone to come who can carry it for me  this undoes the benefit of buying cat litter in this form and in bulk so unless supplier changes delivery company thats it for me

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: i recently tried out the catsan smart pack cat litter upon a friends recommendation as someone who has been using regular catsan litter for quite some time i was excited to give this new product a whirl however after using it for a while now i have mixed feelings about its performancefirstly let me start by highlighting the positives the catsan smart pack cat litter does an excellent job in terms of odor control and clumping ability it effectively keeps any unpleasant smells at bay leaving my home smelling fresh and clean the clumps formed are tight and easy to scoop up making the cleaning process hasslefree this aspect alone earns it a decent rating of however when considering the price difference between the catsan smart pack and their regular litter i must admit that i am slightly disappointed while i had hoped that the smart pack would last longer due to its unique design and packaging i found that it didnt live up to my expectations in terms of longevity considering the higher price tag i expected it to be more costeffective in the long run sadly this was not the caseanother drawback worth mentioning is that these smart packs do not fit all types of cat litter trays if you have a standard rectangular tray with no raised sides or unusual shapes then youre good to go however if your tray deviates from this norm in any way you may encounter difficulties fitting the smart pack correctlyoverall while there are certainly positive aspects to highlight about the catsan smart pack cat litter such as its superior odor control and clumping ability i personally feel that it falls short when considering its value for money compared to regular catsan litter additionally the limited compatibility with certain cat litter trays can be quite inconvenientso despite giving it a rating of  out of  due to its positive attributes mentioned earlier i have decided that i wont be purchasing the catsan smart pack cat litter again in the future instead i will stick to the regular catsan litter that has served me well and offers better value for my money in my opinion

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: it was a little on the expensive side but it lasts longer

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: product is great however evri are terrible my order wasnt due to come until the day after however it came a day early when i was at work they are supposed to do  delivery attempts but just left it on my doorstep in the rain had to dry tthe next to my radiator terrible service

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: as a proud owner of four feline friends finding a litter that effectively combats odours has been a gamechanger and catsan hygiene cat litter has done just that its exceptional absorbency keeps the litter box fresh significantly reducing the dreaded cat poop smell its easy to maintain making our daily cleaning routine much simpler despite its slightly higher price the quality and quantity provided offer great value plus its minimal dust production is a bonus for our respiratory health highly recommend for anyone with multiple cats looking for a stressfree litter solution

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: the best liners ive used to far they fit many different sizes of tray and dont hold a smell much more sturdy than other litter liners i have tried which often rip and tear but these hold up great against claws this helps when cleaning as its easier to remove the bag as its all in one piece and there arent holes for pee and other substances to leak through making cleaning that much easieronly thing i would suggest is you might need to buy another normal bag just to top it up a bit depending on the size of tray you use kg is a bit thin of a layer for my tray but it is a large one so i buy a kg bag on top and throw an extra kg or so on top when i change the litter

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: im trying to find a good litter  this litter was ok but i found it began to smell a lot quicker that others ive tried and one of my cats in particular took a dislike to it

job in terms of odor control and clumping ability it effectively keeps any unpleasant smells at bay leaving my home smelling fresh and clean the clumps formed are tight and easy to scoop up making the cleaning process hasslefree this aspect alone earns it a decent rating of however when considering the price difference between the catsan smart pack and their regular litter i must admit that i am slightly disappointed while i had hoped that the smart pack would last longer due to its unique design and packaging i found that it didnt live up to my expectations in terms of longevity considering the higher price tag i expected it to be more costeffective in the long run sadly this was not the caseanother drawback worth mentioning is that these smart packs do not fit all types of cat litter trays if you have a standard rectangular tray with no raised sides or unusual shapes then youre good to go however if your tray deviates from this norm in any way you may encounter difficulties fitting the smart pack correctlyoverall while there are certainly positive aspects to highlight about the catsan smart pack cat litter such as its superior odor control and clumping ability i personally feel that it falls short when considering its value for money compared to regular catsan litter additionally the limited compatibility with certain cat litter trays can be quite inconvenientso despite giving it a rating of  out of  due to its positive attributes mentioned earlier i have decided that i wont be purchasing the catsan smart pack cat litter again in the future instead i will stick to the regular catsan litter that has served me well and offers better value for my money in my opinion

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: it was a little on the expensive side but it lasts longer

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: product is great however evri are terrible my order wasnt due to come until the day after however it came a day early when i was at work they are supposed to do  delivery attempts but just left it on my doorstep in the rain had to dry tthe next to my radiator terrible service

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: as a proud owner of four feline friends finding a litter that effectively combats odours has been a gamechanger and catsan hygiene cat litter has done just that its exceptional absorbency keeps the litter box fresh significantly reducing the dreaded cat poop smell its easy to maintain making our daily cleaning routine much simpler despite its slightly higher price the quality and quantity provided offer great value plus its minimal dust production is a bonus for our respiratory health highly recommend for anyone with multiple cats looking for a stressfree litter solution

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: the best liners ive used to far they fit many different sizes of tray and dont hold a smell much more sturdy than other litter liners i have tried which often rip and tear but these hold up great against claws this helps when cleaning as its easier to remove the bag as its all in one piece and there arent holes for pee and other substances to leak through making cleaning that much easieronly thing i would suggest is you might need to buy another normal bag just to top it up a bit depending on the size of tray you use kg is a bit thin of a layer for my tray but it is a large one so i buy a kg bag on top and throw an extra kg or so on top when i change the litter

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: im trying to find a good litter  this litter was ok but i found it began to smell a lot quicker that others ive tried and one of my cats in particular took a dislike to it

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: good litter cat seems to like using it i have a mat under the tray to catch the odd bit that comes off on the cats feet it seems to hold the smell although i do replace frequently not too expensive for a large bag

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: really good product been buying cheap litter for years and always had an issue with odours not with this one though doesnt clump together meaning you can easily scoop out solids and is very long lasting because of not having to constantly remove large amounts of clumped litter so actually works out cheaper in the long run

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: very absorbent doesnt all clump into a lump  reduces odour  not noticed any cat wee smell and we have three litter trays dotted around the house for two very young kittens we all know cat wee is a horrible strong odour highly recommend

Name: catsan hygiene cat litter l
Reviews: excellent product worth the extra cost to me as i have copd so this saves a lot of tiring effort for me however unfortunately the company used hermes to deliver  my local evri agent will not ring the front door bell but instead insists on going past the front door and bell round the side of the house and leaving packages whatever the weather round there for me to discover sometimes days later  this time i found the package but its too heavy for me to carry to my door so ill have to wait for someone to come who can carry it for me  this undoes the benefit of buying cat litter in this form and in bulk so unless supplier changes delivery company thats it for me

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i never review things unless they really are good this stuff stinks to high heaven strong bleach smell but it got the black mould we found behind a chest of drawers off completely there literally isnt a trace of it left at all i sprayed it liberally left if for an hour or so then wiped it down and about half had gone then i re sprayed it and left it again this time i walked back in to the nd pic ou can see the wall is still a bit wet from the spray but the mould was completely gone cant say fairer than that i also used it on our bathroom sealant round the bath which i had previously scrubbed over and over and again it worked wonders it didnt  remove all the black stains on the sealant and tiles but it got  of it it looks souch better brilliant stuff just make sure you wear a mask and ventilate the heck out of the rooms you are spraying takes a good  hours to smell normal again

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i had a problem with rising damp this was easy to apply i left it to soak in and when i went to clean it off most of the mould had already disappeared very pleased with the result the smell of bleach was pretty strong but was pretty much gone by the next day

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: our bathroom condensation was getting so bad that mould was growing quickly in and above the shower i was having to clean the mould in the shower with bleach and a toothbrush almost every week and couldnt reach the mould on the ceiling it was getting to the point that i was embarrassed to have guests overordered this and sprayed the whole shower and ceiling above the shower and left it whilst it does say to leave it  minutes i was cooking at the time so left it longer after a couple of hours i went to check and was amazed to find everything gleaming white not a single speck of mould and no scrubbing involved i rinsed it all with water apart from the ceiling obviously and whilst there is a strong smell of bleach in the bathroom its better than no smell and mouldso glad i bought this wish id taken pictures now

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: having tried many many mould sprays this is the only one that is really highly effectiveive used the spray on silicone sealant that i expected would require expensive replacement as dark black mould spots were present but just a couple of applications and the mould disappeared altogethervery deep dark  large areas of mould which has penetrated throughout the sealant may not disappear or several applications but will fade significantlyin addition to bathroom  kitchen sealant i use it on discoloured grout backs of furniture with care not to soak having tested an area first  not expensivevarnished items window frames  seals skirting boards and bathroomshower walls  ceilings i dont think its recommended for painted surfaces but as no scrubbing is required its been absolutely fine on white emulsionpainted areas in my experience wherever possible i spray the area generously and leave overnight very deepdarklarge areas may require a second or even third applicationit does have a strong chemical odour similar to strong bleach and care must be taken to protect from breathing in spraying near eyes  especially ceilings etc but taking common sense precautions is all thats required eg mask goggles a must if spraying at higher levels and always ventilate the room by opening a windowi work in property management and attend many properties with condensation mould  per year this has been fantastic for dealing with mould issues quickly and easilywe also use this routinely for cleaning bathrooms grout sealant  ceilings between tenancies as it saves so much time and expense as opposed to scrubbing grout with bleach and a toothbrush or worse still to remove and reapply sealant around baths showers basins etcin my own home i used to have the sealant replaced in the shower every  months since using this it looks like new and keeps fresh for several years keeping on top of mould spots and spraying as they arise prevents the requirement for multiple applications results are speedy and it makes one bottle last foreverive only dropped one star as the product takes several hours to do its magic so further applications and property visits in the case of work might be required the odour is significant when working with large areas of mouldbut im just being strict in case people are highly sensitive to the strong chemical odour or expect one squirt to perform miracles within seconds the safety catch above the trigger is a bit fiddly but an essential safety feature for childsafety and accidents the internal tube now needs inserting prior to first use which again is fiddly but a good feature to prevent the tube being damaged by the chemical if its left to sit in the bottle for a long time before use  as has happened in the pastthese are just my own personal experiences and opinions hope it helpsif there was an option id rate it

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: wow what a product this works brilliantly it removed  of all the mold in the area we used it in very strong bleaching type agent in it i would saythe best product we have tried so far and tried a few needs a lot of ventilationgloves and a mask must be used as instructed as a strong productlove it it works really well good as a spray as easy to apply and direct to areas needed

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: half of our bathroom ceiling was completelyblack with mould  i ordered this spry today and i sprayed a small patch first to see what will happen within about  minutes the mould had disappeared little light bits left behind so i gave a spry again but this time onlya little bit it was like magic completely gone i then sprayed the whole ceiling and without any rubbing or touching everything disappeared i really wish i had taken a photo of before and after im going to do my bed room ceilingand this time i will definitely take photos i honestly can not believe the resultsyou just have to be careful when spraying that it does not go in to your eyes and on your face it was the ceiling so definitely it was going to drip back but i had put a scarf over by face  just peaked out to see that i was spraying in the right place its quiet strong smelling so i opened the bathroom windows just take care with it and you will notbe disappointed

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i recently battled stubborn mold stains on my walls and this product worked wonders in eliminating themthe effectiveness of hg mould spray is truly remarkable with just a few sprays and minimal scrubbing the mold stains vanished before my eyes leaving behind clean and fresh walls its incredible how quickly and effortlessly this product works

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: this product works perfectly very quick and kills it all i couldnt see mold after id used it it lost a star because the spray nozzle leaks everywhere so be very careful if you use this stuffi learnt the hard way and ruined the tshirt and definitely should have been wearing glovesmajor plus side the black mold goneoh another little thing which is in small print on the back of the bottle try it out before you spray it all over the place as it contains bleach good idea to also crack a window as the fumes are kind of strong from the bleach

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: for as long as we have owned our house we have struggled with black mouldcondensation due to it being old  and having no cavity in the past we have tried different mixtures from vinegar bleach other mould sprays plus have used a dehumidifier along with  damp boxes in nooks and crannies alas we have a constant battle with the black stuff every year we dread autumn through to spring but this year we found this spray and it has been a game changerwe have mainly used it on walls grout and windows and this little bottle has cut out hours of scrubbing and lots of stress and worry i dont like the idea use of using chemicals but it really worries me about the health effects the damp has on my family and this  product has made a significant impact on our lengthy battle with trying to keep it away i would thoroughly recommend it and just advise that people follow the manufacturers instructions

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i very rarely leave reviews but after using this i felt i simply had to i have never seen anything see off mould as fast ever we live in an apartment south facing which is great in summer but in the winter all the doors are battened down and vents closed to keep the heat in as the wind hits us straight off the pennines result mould around the edges of the windows due to condensation this product removed it in seconds rather than spray directly onto the mould i sprayed a little on a damp cloth which was going straight in the bin afterwards wiped it over the mould did the same again a few seconds later andgone wiped it down with a clean wet cloth then a dry oneit smells a bit so keep the windows openwould i recommend it in a heartbeat

fine on white emulsionpainted areas in my experience wherever possible i spray the area generously and leave overnight very deepdarklarge areas may require a second or even third applicationit does have a strong chemical odour similar to strong bleach and care must be taken to protect from breathing in spraying near eyes  especially ceilings etc but taking common sense precautions is all thats required eg mask goggles a must if spraying at higher levels and always ventilate the room by opening a windowi work in property management and attend many properties with condensation mould  per year this has been fantastic for dealing with mould issues quickly and easilywe also use this routinely for cleaning bathrooms grout sealant  ceilings between tenancies as it saves so much time and expense as opposed to scrubbing grout with bleach and a toothbrush or worse still to remove and reapply sealant around baths showers basins etcin my own home i used to have the sealant replaced in the shower every  months since using this it looks like new and keeps fresh for several years keeping on top of mould spots and spraying as they arise prevents the requirement for multiple applications results are speedy and it makes one bottle last foreverive only dropped one star as the product takes several hours to do its magic so further applications and property visits in the case of work might be required the odour is significant when working with large areas of mouldbut im just being strict in case people are highly sensitive to the strong chemical odour or expect one squirt to perform miracles within seconds the safety catch above the trigger is a bit fiddly but an essential safety feature for childsafety and accidents the internal tube now needs inserting prior to first use which again is fiddly but a good feature to prevent the tube being damaged by the chemical if its left to sit in the bottle for a long time before use  as has happened in the pastthese are just my own personal experiences and opinions hope it helpsif there was an option id rate it
