Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: half of our bathroom ceiling was completelyblack with mould  i ordered this spry today and i sprayed a small patch first to see what will happen within about  minutes the mould had disappeared little light bits left behind so i gave a spry again but this time onlya little bit it was like magic completely gone i then sprayed the whole ceiling and without any rubbing or touching everything disappeared i really wish i had taken a photo of before and after im going to do my bed room ceilingand this time i will definitely take photos i honestly can not believe the resultsyou just have to be careful when spraying that it does not go in to your eyes and on your face it was the ceiling so definitely it was going to drip back but i had put a scarf over by face  just peaked out to see that i was spraying in the right place its quiet strong smelling so i opened the bathroom windows just take care with it and you will notbe disappointed

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i recently battled stubborn mold stains on my walls and this product worked wonders in eliminating themthe effectiveness of hg mould spray is truly remarkable with just a few sprays and minimal scrubbing the mold stains vanished before my eyes leaving behind clean and fresh walls its incredible how quickly and effortlessly this product works

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: this product works perfectly very quick and kills it all i couldnt see mold after id used it it lost a star because the spray nozzle leaks everywhere so be very careful if you use this stuffi learnt the hard way and ruined the tshirt and definitely should have been wearing glovesmajor plus side the black mold goneoh another little thing which is in small print on the back of the bottle try it out before you spray it all over the place as it contains bleach good idea to also crack a window as the fumes are kind of strong from the bleach

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: for as long as we have owned our house we have struggled with black mouldcondensation due to it being old  and having no cavity in the past we have tried different mixtures from vinegar bleach other mould sprays plus have used a dehumidifier along with  damp boxes in nooks and crannies alas we have a constant battle with the black stuff every year we dread autumn through to spring but this year we found this spray and it has been a game changerwe have mainly used it on walls grout and windows and this little bottle has cut out hours of scrubbing and lots of stress and worry i dont like the idea use of using chemicals but it really worries me about the health effects the damp has on my family and this  product has made a significant impact on our lengthy battle with trying to keep it away i would thoroughly recommend it and just advise that people follow the manufacturers instructions

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i very rarely leave reviews but after using this i felt i simply had to i have never seen anything see off mould as fast ever we live in an apartment south facing which is great in summer but in the winter all the doors are battened down and vents closed to keep the heat in as the wind hits us straight off the pennines result mould around the edges of the windows due to condensation this product removed it in seconds rather than spray directly onto the mould i sprayed a little on a damp cloth which was going straight in the bin afterwards wiped it over the mould did the same again a few seconds later andgone wiped it down with a clean wet cloth then a dry oneit smells a bit so keep the windows openwould i recommend it in a heartbeat

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i never review things unless they really are good this stuff stinks to high heaven strong bleach smell but it got the black mould we found behind a chest of drawers off completely there literally isnt a trace of it left at all i sprayed it liberally left if for an hour or so then wiped it down and about half had gone then i re sprayed it and left it again this time i walked back in to the nd pic ou can see the wall is still a bit wet from the spray but the mould was completely gone cant say fairer than that i also used it on our bathroom sealant round the bath which i had previously scrubbed over and over and again it worked wonders it didnt  remove all the black stains on the sealant and tiles but it got  of it it looks souch better brilliant stuff just make sure you wear a mask and ventilate the heck out of the rooms you are spraying takes a good  hours to smell normal again

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml
Reviews: i had a problem with rising damp this was easy to apply i left it to soak in and when i went to clean it off most of the mould had already disappeared very pleased with the result the smell of bleach was pretty strong but was pretty much gone by the next day

Name: hg mould spray effective mould spray  mildew cleaner removes mouldy stains from walls tiles silicone seals  more  ml

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: the media could not be loaded                                                                        as a parent one of my top priorities is ensuring the wellbeing of my little one and that includes choosing products that are safe gentle and environmentally friendly waterwipes original plastic free baby wipes have become an essential part of my daily baby care routine and i couldnt be happier with my decision heres why these wipes deserve a fivestar reviewpure and gentle waterwipes are specifically designed with babies in mind they contain only two ingredients   purified water and a drop of fruit extract this minimalistic approach ensures that my babys sensitive skin is pampered without exposure to harsh chemicals fragrances or irritantsultimate convenience with a pack of  wipes in each bundle these wipes are perfect for busy parents i never have to worry about running out of wipes at inconvenient times plus the wipes are conveniently sized making them easy to use onehandedsuperior quality the wipes themselves are strong durable and have a smooth texture that effectively cleans without causing any abrasions they are moist enough to get the job done but not overly wet which i appreciateecofriendly choice one of the standout features of waterwipes is their commitment to sustainability these wipes are plasticfree and the packaging is recyclable its reassuring to know that im not contributing to environmental pollution while caring for my babyversatile use these wipes are not just for diaper changes ive found them handy for various tasks from wiping messy hands and faces to cleaning up spills and even refreshing onthego their versatility makes them a practical choice for any parenthypoallergenic waterwipes are dermatologistapproved and hypoallergenic this is a huge relief for parents of babies with sensitive skin or allergies as it reduces the risk of irritation or rashesno nasty residue after using waterwipes ive noticed theres no sticky residue left behind on my babys skin which can sometimes happen with other wipes their pure and gentle nature ensures my baby stays clean and comfortablein summary waterwipes original plastic free baby wipes have exceeded my expectations in every way they provide the utmost care for my babys skin while also aligning with my values of environmental responsibility with a generous count in each pack theyre a practical and costeffective choice i wholeheartedly recommend waterwipes to fellow parents who want the best for their little ones without compromising on quality or sustainability these wipes have become an indispensable part of my parenting journey and i wouldnt have it any other way

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: not the cheapest of wipes but definitely the bestmy daughter has suffered from eczema and sensitive skin from a very young age other wipes would make her face very red and sore after cleaning her i have tried other  water wipes but they often dry out too quickly and start to smell damp these wipes never smell even after being open for a week they are consistently perfectly moist throughout the pack and are easy to get out one at a time they clean very easily and never leave my baby sore honestly just as good as cotton wool and water which i would use if i have the time and patience wipes and definitely worth the money for my sweet babies comfort the box is very strong and well sealed so may need a wrench to originally get into them though hehe

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: ive been using these wipes for my baby from day  and never caused any rashes or skin reactions love that these are made with  water and helps with all necessary cleaning for baby doesnt rip like some other wipes so its good quality as well its a bit pricey but i always buy them when they are on offer

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: most wipes feel very dry and sometimes coarse water wipes however have been very soft on my baby and are wet enough to actually clean him up rather than just push around the mess

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: i recently purchased the waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes and im thrilled with my choice the count pack  packs is not only convenient but also ecofriendly with its plasticfree design these wipes live up to their promise of being  waterbased making them ideal for my babys sensitive skin the unscented formula adds an extra layer of gentleness overall a reliable and ecoconscious choice for any parent

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: i have to use wipes as i have a stoma i like the fact they dont sting if youve ever wondered why your baby girl crys when you use baby wipes to clean their bitsits coz most wipes sting like heck they dont have perfume in or alcohol they are water and now these wipes dont have plastic in themthey are better for the planet most wipes do still have plastic in them and if you dig those up in yrs time they will still be recognisable as baby wipes bad for the planet bad for animals on land and seaplease dont flush wipes down the loo they dont dissolve no wipes do causing blockages in sewer pipes nd harm at sea thank you these wipes dont leave your skin feeling sticky when youre skin is cleaned so big bonus only problem i have is that the wipes dont come out of the packet easy if the big brand most usedin uk anyway can make each wipe follow on from the last when pulled out why cant you or a lot of other makes for that matter i have to fiddle around trying to find the end of the next wipe without either ripping the wipe or pulling a lot of them out at once coz i need them quickly and then trying to stuff the ones not used back in the packet or wiping surfaces with them just to use them but then i run out of wipes for the purpose i need them most annoying nd expensive which noone needs right nowthis is the only fault with them tho it is a pain in emergencys i will keep buying this brand coz they are not expensive dont sting dont leave sticky residue and dont contain plastic in the wipesthe packet obviously is plastic i would recommend for these reasons make your little baby girl smile and nappy changing time and if you have a stomause these so you dont grit teeth at the stingingburning that most wipes cause and actually feel clean once you have used them

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: water wipes have been a game changer for me and i use them for all kinds of personal care and also for my dogs one of which has severe allergies like me so far ive only found two brands that do not trigger my pompholyx eczema too badly waterwipes and cheeky panda many other brands that claim to be  water still have chemicals in and in me that means the itching within seconds and itchy blisters start formingperformance they arent as thick as some other brands and it seems they used to be a little thicker as well but theyre still thick enough to be effective and hold onto water and be used firmly and it also makes it easier to clean fiddly bits like ears so it isnt a big loss that theyre a little thinner as they dont have many added ingredients it means you can still use them with any cleanser or lotion of your choice and irritants arent sealed in close to the skin by lotion as mentioned earlier i also use them for my dog with allergies as we have to wipe his face with something that hasnt been washed in detergents to remove any traces that might trigger his contact allergy the wipes are strong enough to not tear or disintegrate when used on his whiskers but at the same time theyre soft so they dont damage his thin fragile soft whippety skini get that for some they smell a bit unappealing due to the lack of perfumes but for many people those are the worst triggers for their allergies and some people may want lotion in their baby wipes so to them it will seem like theyre missing those ingredients but this is what allergy sufferers need products that are as pure as possible of course some people may still be sensitive to any of the ingredients in these wipes but for my allergy needs waterwipes are perfect and leave no residue to cause any other problemsbecause of waterwipes not having lotion or surfactants in they are safe to be used near eyes and sensitive areas so can be used to take makeup off in conjunction with a suitable makeup remover as well as facial cleansing i personally now wouldnt travel without any especially in public toilets which may have questionable hygiene and during air travel even if you dont have kids theyre so multipurpose and handy they quickly become the sort of thing where you wonder how you ever lived without them

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: love these wipes better than the other brands theyre really wet and ive never had any dry out despite the pack being left open i used them on face and hands too

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: i have  baby boys so ive been threw my fair share of baby wipe brands and when i reccomend something rest knowing ive tested a alot before commenting these wipes are perfect if you have to constantly change your babies one is enough as it has plenty of water that it can clean every bit of wat you need and still have some not touched even babies that get rashes or skin irritation these are perfect they dont dry out even for a couple months the pack is easy to use can get a few lids that rip the pack but thats if your pulling them open to hard in a rush some wipes can get stuck together but alot less than many other brands huggies have nothing on this company as you can see there baby wipes leaving white bits all over when using them these wipes nothing comes off them no bits of white on fabric or stuck to bums the best brand out there worth paying for as you will use less wipes than you do with any others so you will save money buy spending alittle more and also alot healthier on ur skin as many other brands would cause skin irritation or rashes there is no smell or scent never had any issues with these and will continue to buy them

do not trigger my pompholyx eczema too badly waterwipes and cheeky panda many other brands that claim to be  water still have chemicals in and in me that means the itching within seconds and itchy blisters start formingperformance they arent as thick as some other brands and it seems they used to be a little thicker as well but theyre still thick enough to be effective and hold onto water and be used firmly and it also makes it easier to clean fiddly bits like ears so it isnt a big loss that theyre a little thinner as they dont have many added ingredients it means you can still use them with any cleanser or lotion of your choice and irritants arent sealed in close to the skin by lotion as mentioned earlier i also use them for my dog with allergies as we have to wipe his face with something that hasnt been washed in detergents to remove any traces that might trigger his contact allergy the wipes are strong enough to not tear or disintegrate when used on his whiskers but at the same time theyre soft so they dont damage his thin fragile soft whippety skini get that for some they smell a bit unappealing due to the lack of perfumes but for many people those are the worst triggers for their allergies and some people may want lotion in their baby wipes so to them it will seem like theyre missing those ingredients but this is what allergy sufferers need products that are as pure as possible of course some people may still be sensitive to any of the ingredients in these wipes but for my allergy needs waterwipes are perfect and leave no residue to cause any other problemsbecause of waterwipes not having lotion or surfactants in they are safe to be used near eyes and sensitive areas so can be used to take makeup off in conjunction with a suitable makeup remover as well as facial cleansing i personally now wouldnt travel without any especially in public toilets which may have questionable hygiene and during air travel even if you dont have kids theyre so multipurpose and handy they quickly become the sort of thing where you wonder how you ever lived without them

Name: waterwipes plasticfree original baby wipes  count  packs  water based wipes unscented for sensitive skin
Reviews: not the cheapest of wipes but definitely the bestmy daughter has suffered from eczema and sensitive skin from a very young age other wipes would make her face very red and sore after cleaning her i have tried other  water wipes but they often dry out too quickly and start to smell damp these wipes never smell even after being open for a week they are consistently perfectly moist throughout the pack and are easy to get out one at a time they clean very easily and never leave my baby sore honestly just as good as cotton wool and water which i would use if i have the time and patience wipes and definitely worth the money for my sweet babies comfort the box is very strong and well sealed so may need a wrench to originally get into them though hehe

Name: earth rated dog poo bags guaranteed leak proof and extra thick waste bag refill rolls for dogs lavender scented  count
Reviews: i have a giant of a  year old gsd so you can imagine the size of his waste these bags are large so theres plenty of much needed room inside and although i used to prefer bags with handles these bags are just as easy to tie up and i actually prefer this type of bag now i keep a roll with a small rubber band around them in mine it saves space my pockets are tidier and its much easier to find a tissue in my coat pocket than it was with loose bags in them if im out without a coat i keep a halfroll in my th jeans pocket they fit in there rather nicelyas well as being big  x  cm these bags are strong they dont tear easily and ive never poked a finger through these bags very much unlike the more nappy bag bags i used to use before they are a big step up from those flimsy bags and although the cost is a little more i find im using less bags and i dont need to double bag them to stop or reduce smells escaping from bags in my garden dog bin either even in the summer they are definitely a more hygienic option the dog bin used to smell bad in warm weather but these bags really do a good job of keeping the smell therefore the bacteria in the bag i do sometimes get a whiff from the bags during hot sunny summer weather thoughdoes anyone wake up some mornings to find foxes have broken into your bin and strewn bags all over the garden i do i have a fox problem here perhaps likely from a couple of my neighbours who keep chickens and ducks but problem depends on your view on foxes of course for me mine are garden pests but i like them otherwise point here is these bags have never split from being thrown around by foxes although im sure they could get into them if they really wanted to im still devising solutions to stop them getting into my binthe rolls have  bags on each the perforations are good and in line and this ensures they are easy to remove from the roll ive not had even one bag wasted by tearing it when tearing one off the roll i buy the  pack so they work out at around p each when buying the pack at full price currently  for me thats a cost of p per weeknote they are certified  recycled plastic now and im keen to reduce my plastic waste so this is a big plus for me i hope this company continues to be environmentally conscious because when companies provide more environmental products it helps consumers make better choicespros recycled plasticlarge and strongdo not tear easilyleakproofeasy to tie upeasy to rip a bag off the rollsmells leak less in hot weather otherwise no noticeable smell at allconsmore expensive than other bags potentially its a bag we throw away so how good do you need your poo bags to becosts  for my dogs usep per bag at full price  costs me around p per week roll of  bags lasts approx  daysthe whole pack of  bags lasts  days or approx  months

Name: earth rated dog poo bags guaranteed leak proof and extra thick waste bag refill rolls for dogs lavender scented  count
Reviews: as a dog owner in the uk ive been using earth rated dog poo bags for quite some time now and i must say they have become an essential part of our daily walks these bags serve their purpose perfectly making it easy and hygienic to clean up after my furry friendone of the things i really like about these bags is their durability they are thick and sturdy so i never have to worry about any unpleasant surprises or leaks they hold up well even with larger messes providing a reliable solution for dog waste disposalanother great feature is the size of the bags they are large enough to accommodate waste from even the biggest dogs ensuring i never run out of space plus the easytotear perforations make it convenient to grab a bag and go saving time during those urgent momentshowever one aspect i wish could be improved is the scent control while the bags do a decent job of containing the odor there are times when its still noticeable it would be great if the bags had stronger scentblocking capabilities to ensure complete freshnessall in all earth rated dog poo bags have been a trustworthy and practical choice for me as a dog owner in the uk they are durable spacious and make cleanup a breeze although the scent control could be enhanced it doesnt overshadow the overall effectiveness of these bags i highly recommend them to fellow dog owners seeking a reliable companion on their walks

Name: earth rated dog poo bags guaranteed leak proof and extra thick waste bag refill rolls for dogs lavender scented  count
Reviews: really cannot recommend these highly enough they are very large and being on a roll save so much time just pulling one as needed instead of scrabbling to extricate one from a pocket full of thin loose black bags there is no unpleasant smell to them they are strong leak proof and by not closing them completely will easily accommodate further deposits even from a very large dog tip  if you find the weather turns on a walk unused bags do make amazing waterproof and windproof gauntlets

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: ive tried many different products to remove stains but none of them worked as well as this one dr beckmann carpet stain remover is amazing it removes new and driedin stains even the ones that have been there for months it works on all kinds of stains such as coffee wine mud chocolate and more it also eliminates odors and leaves a fresh scentthe product comes with a  ml bottle and an applicator brush the bottle has a nozzle that allows you to spray the product directly on the stain the applicator brush has stiff bristles that help to scrub the stain and lift it off the carpet fibers the product is easy to use and doesnt require any rinsing or vacuuming you just spray brush and blot with a clean cloth the stain disappears in minutesthe only thing i dont like about this product is that its quite expensive however i think its worth it because it saves me time and money in the long run i dont have to hire a professional carpet cleaner or replace my carpets i can keep them looking new and clean with this productoverall this is a fantastic product for anyone who has carpets and pets or kids it removes stains quickly and effectively and its easy to use its a miracle worker for stubborn carpet stains i would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable carpet cleaner

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: i had nothing left to lose by trying another product for a horrid dog sick stain on a pale grey stair carpet id tried literally everything tried this stuff and it was gone in one go totally amazing considering the price as well im stocking up

Reviews: i used this dr beckmann stain remover bottle and brush assembly to remove a red wine stain that had dried into the fitted carpet despite attempts by others with various chemicals and also a carpet cleaning machine to remove itworking as per instructions it cleared most of the very large stain in about five minutesi then used the machine to rinse out all the deep seated residues of dr beckmann and stain and here the previously ineffective  machine        suddenly proved very useful leaving the carpet almost dry  if you know where the stain was then you can just about see it but onone else will notice itthe only quibble i have is that the seal on the bottle is now open and there is no alternative cap i can find to fit it

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: we had a puppy for a week over christmas my daughter sensibly kept the puppy away from the kids until after the festivities they got a cute gift after new year imagine an eight week old puppy running wild in your living room because the cats hate him and you are responsible for handing him back with two eyes intact and functioningnow imagine your carpet if you arent quick enough to carry him to the garden this stuff is amazing has saved a fortune in cleaning bills and it totally works highly recommend

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: ive tried many different products to remove stains but none of them worked as well as this one dr beckmann carpet stain remover is amazing it removes new and driedin stains even the ones that have been there for months it works on all kinds of stains such as coffee wine mud chocolate and more it also eliminates odors and leaves a fresh scentthe product comes with a  ml bottle and an applicator brush the bottle has a nozzle that allows you to spray the product directly on the stain the applicator brush has stiff bristles that help to scrub the stain and lift it off the carpet fibers the product is easy to use and doesnt require any rinsing or vacuuming you just spray brush and blot with a clean cloth the stain disappears in minutesthe only thing i dont like about this product is that its quite expensive however i think its worth it because it saves me time and money in the long run i dont have to hire a professional carpet cleaner or replace my carpets i can keep them looking new and clean with this productoverall this is a fantastic product for anyone who has carpets and pets or kids it removes stains quickly and effectively and its easy to use its a miracle worker for stubborn carpet stains i would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable carpet cleaner

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: i had nothing left to lose by trying another product for a horrid dog sick stain on a pale grey stair carpet id tried literally everything tried this stuff and it was gone in one go totally amazing considering the price as well im stocking up

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: the best stain remover for me always works good to have on hand quick to use with the scrubby head must admit i have refilled my bottle with another carpet cleaner a few times now

Name: dr beckmann carpet stain remover  removes new and driedin stains  includes applicator brush  ml
Reviews: i used this dr beckmann stain remover bottle and brush assembly to remove a red wine stain that had dried into the fitted carpet despite attempts by others with various chemicals and also a carpet cleaning machine to remove itworking as per instructions it cleared most of the very large stain in about five minutesi then used the machine to rinse out all the deep seated residues of dr beckmann and stain and here the previously ineffective  machine        suddenly proved very useful leaving the carpet almost dry  if you know where the stain was then you can just about see it but onone else will notice itthe only quibble i have is that the seal on the bottle is now open and there is no alternative cap i can find to fit it

extralarge sheets that are designed to tackle tough cleaning tasks with easekey featuressupersized sheets the household towel comes with supersized sheets providing you with ample surface area to tackle large spills messes and cleaning tasks each sheet is generously sized to make cleaning faster and more efficienttriple layered strength the triplelayered design of the household towel offers the regina blitz household towel is highly absorbent making it perfect for wiping up spills and messes effectively its quickdrying property ensures that surfaces are left clean and dry in no timeversatile cleaning whether you need to clean spills in the kitchen wipe surfaces in the bathroom or tackle general household cleaning tasks the regina blitz household towel is up to the challenge its versatility makes it a valuable asset in any homeconvenient pack with  rolls in a pack youll have an abundant supply of household towels to last for extended periods saving you frequent trips to the storesturdy and reliable the regina blitz household towel is made to withstand rigorous cleaning routines without compromising on performance it is reliable ensuring consistent results with every useeasytouse design the perforated sheets are easy to tear off allowing for hasslefree and messfree dispensing you can easily grab a sheet with one hand while keeping the roll secureexperience the cleaning power of the regina blitz household towel and say goodbye to tough messes and spills with its supersized sheets triplelayered strength and absorbent capabilities this household towel is the ultimate cleaning companion for every home it is a reliable and effective cleaning solution that will simplify your daily cleaning tasks and keep your home spick and span

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: i am a loyal regina blitz customer and i can confidently say that i will continue to choose this kitchen roll over others the longlasting quality and costeffective nature of this product make it a staple in my kitchen and i highly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable and efficient kitchenhousehold rollone of the standout features of the regina blitz household towel is its remarkable durability and consistent performance unlike other brands that seem to change with every iteration regina blitz has remained steadfast in delivering exceptional quality over the years from spills to general cleaning this household product does exactly what it claims to do and it continues to impress me with its strength super absorbency and overall fussfree functionalityhaving experienced the unparalleled effectiveness i can confidently say that its a product you dont want to miss out on the initial price may seem steep but the longterm costeffectiveness is undeniable the value and performance justify the investment especially when purchasing through amazon where the price is more than justified for the quantity and quality you receiveits worth noting that regina blitz offers other products similar to this one but based on my experience they dont quite match up in terms of quality dont be swayed by imitations stick with the original regina blitz household towel for the superior performance you deserve

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: the regina blitz household towel is the ultimate solution for all your cleaning needs offering unbeatable strength supersized sheets and triplelayered durability with  sheets in one pack this household towel is the perfect companion for your everyday cleaning tasksone of the standout features of the regina blitz household towel is its triplelayered strength this design ensures that the towel is strong and absorbent making it perfect for tackling tough spills and messes around the housewith  supersized sheets in one pack you have an ample supply of household towel that lasts longer saving you time and money on frequent replacementsthe regina blitz household towel is designed to be versatile and suitable for a wide range of cleaning tasks from wiping surfaces to drying hands and morethe absorbent and durable nature of the towel makes it ideal for various cleaning tasks both wet and dry giving you the confidence to tackle any household messthe convenience of the supersized sheets means you can tackle larger cleaning jobs with ease without having to use multiple towelsin conclusion the regina blitz household towel offers unbeatable strength supersized sheets and triplelayered durability for all your cleaning needs with  sheets in one pack this household towel is a costeffective and efficient solution for everyday cleaning tasks embrace the convenience and performance of the regina blitz household towel and experience the joy of a clean and tidy home

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: i tend to buy only this brand of paper towel now as they are the strongest and can handle an impressive amount of liquid they dont disintegrate like cheaper brands and the jumbo sizing on the rolls mean they last a long time before needing replacing too theyre not the cheapest though and recent pricing has been a bit offputting but when they are priced normally theyre better value in my eyes than cheaper versions where you will end using more in the longrun

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: these kitchen rolls are really good they are large and thick and soak up all of the juice you can squirt at it  there are cheaper options but really these are worth the money

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: the best product of it type really strong and handy to dry my windows in the morning it absorbs a fair amount always stock up when bulk packs are on offer at amazon

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: this is a really good product its very absorbent and very economical in use as a resultits been  a essential in our household for a while and we have discovered all sorts of uses for it  mainly variations on the theme of mopping up spills  as a substitute for cloths for cleaning work surfaces for cleaningpolishing glassware but ive also used it to clean my specs  apply polish to wood car polish to my car and ive found it works great to staunch blood flow whilst i scrabble around for a sticking plasterwe buy  rolls a month via amazon subscribe and save which makes for a more economic purchase than using any other source we know of  im always amazed how we manage to get through that many rolls in a typical month but we do  amazingly we even had to buy a couple of extra rolls from a local supermarket over christmas so we are great fanswe are not great fans of amazons method of packing this stuff for deliverywe had our monthly delivery of subscribe and save items yesterday and today  both deliveries came via a amazon evan whilst i dont entirely believe the propoganda re electric vehicles broadly speaking i guess this is better than diesel and also good for amazons eco credentialssaturdays delivery included a pack of  andrex toilet rolls this pack has aprroximately twice the volume occupied by the regina kitchen towel  pack  the andrex loo rolls just  came shrink wrapped with  a label identifying me and my address  this is definitely ecofriendly as packaging was minimaltodays  and previous deliveries of the regina product use packagng which verges on the absurdas previously the kitchen rolls arrived packed in a huge cardboard box of roughly twice the volume needed even more absurd the unused space was filled with something like  yards of paper wrap amazon please please please stop this nonsense  its wholly unneccesary definitley ecounfriendly and also wastes my time as i have to cut up all this redundant packaging so that it can fit it in our green bin  and and it takes up far too much volume in the lattercould someone explain why regina kitchen towels need to be hidden from prying eyes in a box whilst the toilet rolls  being wrapped in transaprent plastic  are not  are pilferers so selective

Name: regina blitz household towel  supersized sheets triple layered strength  rolls
Reviews: this is very useful for mopping up spills on kitchen floor as it is fairly thick and strong  i sometimes use it to wipe kitchen sink and or collect debris from kitchen sink drain  i also use it on a tray for catching drink and food spills  as it has good strength i sometimes use it for drying my washed hands in the kitchen  i find it a useful adaptable paper product

mealpros vitamin d plays a vital role in many aspects of health especially in regions where sunlight exposure is limited or during winter months ultra vitamin d provides effective levels of vitamin d that can help maintain normal immune function cell division and muscle function it is suitable for vegetarians and has no artificial colours preservatives salt yeast or lactose it has a compact by design certification which means it has less packaging and carbon footprint than other products it is affordable and easy to order online from amazoncons ultra vitamin d may not be suitable for people who have allergies to any of the ingredients or who are taking certain medications you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using any supplement it may not provide enough vitamin d for people who have very low levels or who have certain medical conditions you should always check your vitamin d status with a blood test and follow your doctors advice on the appropriate dosage it may cause side effects such as nausea headache or allergic reactions in some people you should stop taking it and seek medical attention if you experience any adverse reactionsreasons to buy you want interact with vitamin d or affect its absorption or metabolism you have very low or very high levels of vitamin d or other medical conditions that require a different dosage or form of vitamin dconclusionultra vitamin d is a great supplement for anyone who wants to increase their vitamin d intake and support their health and immunity it provides effective levels of vitamin d in a tablet form that is easy to take and environmentally friendly however it may not be suitable for everyone and you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using it i would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality vitamin d supplement that is affordable and convenient

mealpros vitamin d plays a vital role in many aspects of health especially in regions where sunlight exposure is limited or during winter months ultra vitamin d provides effective levels of vitamin d that can help maintain normal immune function cell division and muscle function it is suitable for vegetarians and has no artificial colours preservatives salt yeast or lactose it has a compact by design certification which means it has less packaging and carbon footprint than other products it is affordable and easy to order online from amazoncons ultra vitamin d may not be suitable for people who have allergies to any of the ingredients or who are taking certain medications you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using any supplement it may not provide enough vitamin d for people who have very low levels or who have certain medical conditions you should always check your vitamin d status with a blood test and follow your doctors advice on the appropriate dosage it may cause side effects such as nausea headache or allergic reactions in some people you should stop taking it and seek medical attention if you experience any adverse reactionsreasons to buy you want to boost your vitamin d intake and support your overall health and wellbeing you prefer a tablet form of vitamin d that is easy to swallow and convenient to take you care about the environment and want to choose a product that has less impact on the planetreasons to avoid you have allergies or sensitivities to any of the ingredients in ultra vitamin d you are taking medications that may interact with vitamin d or affect its absorption or metabolism you have very low or very high levels of vitamin d or other medical conditions that require a different dosage or form of vitamin dconclusionultra vitamin d is a great supplement for anyone who wants to increase their vitamin d intake and support their health and immunity it provides effective levels of vitamin d in a tablet form that is easy to take and environmentally friendly however it may not be suitable for everyone and you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using it i would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality vitamin d supplement that is affordable and convenient

Name: azengear emergency survival poncho pc thermal mylar foil coating blanket for heat retention and rain  reversible with hood  waterproof windproof portable handsfree outdoor kit
Reviews: just like an emergency space blanket you see on the news these are just as effective but can be worn like a poncho rather than wrapped aroundthey come in a small packet making them easy to store and carry with you should the situation arise that you need onethey are well made unlikely to tear and having worn one for an hour to see the effect i can confirm they are very warming and comfortinguses could be out on a boat car breakdown in winter hiking on mountains or just to keep around the home for power cuts in snowthey are not single use either  so work out even better value than first appearance

Reviews: good value for money well packed and lightweight comprehensive contents that i will add too ie tube of antiseptic cream a better pair of scissors painkillers etc was confused at first as others are looking at the  star reviews with the dates on some of the contents which appeared to show that they were out of date rang the parent company that supply amazon who are an established reputable medical supplier and they explained that those contents that are sterile will have a date when the item was packed alongside a picture of a building and an expiry date alongside a picture of an egg timer picture attached if the items are not sterile however then they will not have an expiry date just a date when they were packed have suggested that the company put a note to that effect in their packs which they will take on board moving forward

Reviews: ive tried many different products to remove stains but none of them worked as well as this one dr beckmann carpet stain remover is amazing it removes new and driedin stains even the ones that have been there for months it works on all kinds of stains such as coffee wine mud chocolate and more it also eliminates odors and leaves a fresh scentthe product comes with a  ml bottle and an applicator brush the bottle has a nozzle that allows you to spray the product directly on the stain the applicator brush has stiff bristles that help to scrub the stain and lift it off the carpet fibers the product is easy to use and doesnt require any rinsing or vacuuming you just spray brush and blot with a clean cloth the stain disappears in minutesthe only thing i dont like about this product is that its quite expensive however i think its worth it because it saves me time and money in the long run i dont have to hire a professional carpet cleaner or replace my carpets i can keep them looking new and clean with this productoverall this is a fantastic product for anyone who has carpets and pets or kids it removes stains quickly and effectively and its easy to use its a miracle worker for stubborn carpet stains i would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable carpet cleaner

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: good multifuction product the only dislike is that the draw string spring is a little loose other than that it works perfect the flint was good the strike was nice and sharp so you could easily scrap some wood the strike the flint for a fire i mean it was  for two of them so if you are living in the wild you probably would buy something better but i hike regularly and have taken it on  hikes now and have used it to navigate each hike when my phone signal was down overall it is a good product and comfortable to wear

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: since i bought this item ive only ever taken this off to do the dishes or get a wash its a brilliant yet simple piece of survival kit you never know youll need better to have something you dont need than to need it and not have it are the words i live byevery piece of this gear works as intended the compass when unclipped actually works and points in the correct direction my kids love grabbing my arm and blowing the whistle so thats getting some use and driving the missy insane im glad to know i can always start a fire if a survival situation should ever arrive with the flint scraper and rod i find it very comfortable to wear and most often forget its even there worth every penny and best to be safethe only issue i have is the wrist toggle while i appreciate that you can increase or decrease the size of the wrist length the toggle is a bit weak and keeps losing up but thats an easy fix for me

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: the band is quite sturdy and adjustable  cant figure out how you would undo the paracord though  the ferrous and steel did manage to ignite some flaked up toilet paper  so thats a plus  the steel saw says removable but i cannot remove it as it appears glued in  which brings me to the compass  the compass will only give a true reading when the wrist band is separated as the sawsteel for the ignitor is too close to the compass and effects it like a magnet  once you separate the  ends clipped together and put some distance between the metal and the compass it works just fine  the whistle is very basic as expected  given that an all black band and a black and orange band are included  basically getting  for the price of one  i cant complain it all does what it should do really  although positioning of the ignitor steel would have been better placed away from the compass

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: great for outdoor kids everything they need to start a fire or cut some wood plus other stuff looks cool too

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: price  flint

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: unsure if my daughter and son in law will get them through security for an overseas extended  camping and hiking trip but they appreciated them

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: great life saver bracelet got this for someone in ukraine since the war started they look like a really good quality and have a lot of inbuilt mini tools

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: brilliant concept and outstanding value for money at under  each the fire starter does produce a spark although it isnt as large or easy as the one shown in the video although maybe i just need more practiceive seen a few comments referencing that the compass doesnt appear to work which it does but there is a slight issuethe metal blade built into the clip which attaches to the compass section interferes with it and causes the north to constantly point towards the metal which makes the compass appear to be broken when in fact it is just being overridden by the metal of the bladethis means that when the clip is undone it is a perfectly operational piece of equipment that is able to quickly reposition itself as you move but as soon as you wear it the metal overrides it and the north becomes frozenexcluding the compass issue this appears the be an outstanding piece of equipment which is very lightweight and portable some parts are a little wonky but at this price for two items you cant complain

Reviews: brilliant concept and outstanding value for money at under  each the fire starter does produce a spark although it isnt as large or easy as the one shown in the video although maybe i just need more practiceive seen a few comments referencing that the compass doesnt appear to work which it does but there is a slight issuethe metal blade built into the clip which attaches to the compass section interferes with it and causes the north to constantly point towards the metal which makes the compass appear to be broken when in fact it is just being overridden by the metal of the bladethis means that when the clip is undone it is a perfectly operational piece of equipment that is able to quickly reposition itself as you move but as soon as you wear it the metal overrides it and the north becomes frozenexcluding the compass issue this appears the be an outstanding piece of equipment which is very lightweight and portable some parts are a little wonky but at this price for two items you cant complain

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: bought as gift gor someone pleased with it

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: brilliant quality kids love them

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: good multifuction product the only dislike is that the draw string spring is a little loose other than that it works perfect the flint was good the strike was nice and sharp so you could easily scrap some wood the strike the flint for a fire i mean it was  for two of them so if you are living in the wild you probably would buy something better but i hike regularly and have taken it on  hikes now and have used it to navigate each hike when my phone signal was down overall it is a good product and comfortable to wear

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: since i bought this item ive only ever taken this off to do the dishes or get a wash its a brilliant yet simple piece of survival kit you never know youll need better to have something you dont need than to need it and not have it are the words i live byevery piece of this gear works as intended the compass when unclipped actually works and points in the correct direction my kids love grabbing my arm and blowing the whistle so thats getting some use and driving the missy insane im glad to know i can always start a fire if a survival situation should ever arrive with the flint scraper and rod i find it very comfortable to wear and most often forget its even there worth every penny and best to be safethe only issue i have is the wrist toggle while i appreciate that you can increase or decrease the size of the wrist length the toggle is a bit weak and keeps losing up but thats an easy fix for me

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: the band is quite sturdy and adjustable  cant figure out how you would undo the paracord though  the ferrous and steel did manage to ignite some flaked up toilet paper  so thats a plus  the steel saw says removable but i cannot remove it as it appears glued in  which brings me to the compass  the compass will only give a true reading when the wrist band is separated as the sawsteel for the ignitor is too close to the compass and effects it like a magnet  once you separate the  ends clipped together and put some distance between the metal and the compass it works just fine  the whistle is very basic as expected  given that an all black band and a black and orange band are included  basically getting  for the price of one  i cant complain it all does what it should do really  although positioning of the ignitor steel would have been better placed away from the compass

Name: azengear paracord survival bracelet  pack  flint steel fire starter compass whistlehiking accessories wild camping equipment kit bushcraft emergency black and orange
Reviews: great for outdoor kids everything they need to start a fire or cut some wood plus other stuff looks cool too

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: would recommend perfect size belt clip has a velcro and stud to ensure this stays secureive added additional plasters and paracetamol ibuprofen too theres even room for a chapstick theres is a little additional space for these items if you cut the tablet to sizea really handy piece of kit for the car walking or travelling about handy to have around the home toowell worth the price love how everything packs in so well bought this over the more robust kits on amazon as this stands up to bse standards

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: i bought this for a bug out bag and it has everything i would expect or need from a compact first aid kitcomponents seem good quality and it fits inside the fixed side pocket of a maxpedition monsoon backpack perfectly although it is a tight fit  certainly no room for anything else in therei chose this kit specifically for that pocket and although the stated size is just larger than the pocket dimensions it will squash down slightly to fit inside no problemvery pleased with this and it was a good price too  just hope i never need to use it

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: this is a reasonably well thought out first aid kitproseasy to carry size with space to add your own gear in ive added a small pill bottle with pills containing ibuprofen parcetamol aspirin anti indigestion caffeine  antihistamine tablets condoms hangover sachets and waterproof plasters with space for a couple of extra items if needed may add an aluminium blanket  ear plugsconswould have been nice to have it waterproof theyve got the waterproof zip on it surely it wouldnt take much of a change or cost to do so as its such of a small item and lifesystems do make large waterproof versions it would be nice for them to extend this feature to the rest of their range

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: nice and compact set for first aid essentials

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: nice neat bag ideal for traveling always at hand

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: very good quality product we bought it as a backup for our trip has everything i side

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: good little kit to keep in my rucksackcontains all the essentialseven has a decent pair of scissors and tweezers and includes antiseptic creamits lightweight and doesnt take up much spacehappy with purchase

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: its a must when out walking

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: the blue tube ie antiseptic cream shown in the video is not inluded in the list nor in the actual package antiseptic wipe is not going to work in the smae way as the cream if you have an open wound and i cant return the item because the seal in the zip has to be broken to check the content how tricky

Name: lifesystems pocket first aid kit ce certified contents specifically designed for hiking and outdoor
Reviews: the pack is small and light has everything you need for a day out there is also a bit of room for a couple extra items to be thrown in ie chapstick hand gel and painkiller pills etchowever unlike the picture suggests there is no antiseptic cream g within the pack and i also find the zipper to be very stiff  the pack should be designed for a better clamshell opening

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: not used properly as of yet the little use its had it seems to be well built and of the usual high quality that knipex provide

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: ive used these pliers so many times in the past few days they grip like crazy and have paid for themselves a few times over i have no hesitation in recommending the design and manufacturer a top quality tool that has gone straight into the grab bag for urgent tasks rather than sitting in the toolbox

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: i wasnt sure if i needed this but are really quite pleased with it the teeth combination are great and really grippy the movement for size adjustment is nice also and easy to alter then the smooth jaw versions which are  times the price

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: the first time i saw one of my work colleagues with a pair of these i knew i had to have a pair especially with the keen pricing of these the quality is top notch as usual for knipex and these have come in very handy for those little tasks were the other usual knipex pliers and wrenches just dont fit right super impressed with these

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: i was itching to find a job to use these on eventually used on some small snapped off bolts with only a few threads showing gripped perfectly

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: knipex kit is always great quality and these pliers are no exception ive been after a pliers you can use end on and these seemed to fit what i was after so i tried the non insulated ones and found them so useful that i bought the insulated version for electrical workyou wont be disappointed these pliers are in a different league to others both in build quality and design features

Name: knipex twingrip slip joint pliers black atramentized with multicomponent grips  mm
Reviews: the usual excellent knipex quality  no complaints only wish they offered it in a smaller size  if they bring out a mm version i imagine a lot of people would buy it too me included

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: so much better than having batterys that last a few days then end up being thrown lasts a few weeks then recharge and reuse great job petzl saves money in the long term and doesnt creatate as much waste

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: i dont know how ive managed without this for so long ive been using aaas until they run out and then replacing them this avoids all that faff with a great batter life and quick chargingi use mine for trail running at night and it will usually give me at least four hours of good lighti would give it  stars but its not cheap i cant fault the actual unit but if it were at a  price point id have bought more

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: last purchased  used sporadically suddenly stopped working tried to charge seemed to be successful charge as battery light changed from red to green when battery inserted into head torch nothing repeated process and nothing again the cost of the battery is quite expensive at  looking at other users comments it seems that it is quite a common fault now thinking that it is not worth the money and may go back to other types of rechargeable battery i am wrong

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: good service fast delivery reasonable prices

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: love the idea i work on the railway so use my head torch every shift i get about  hours battery life i expected more to be honest for the price battery cost more than my petzl head torch have to charge it after every shift im i the only one with poor battery life or is  hours normal

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: works well avoids having to buy lots of batteries  could have been a better price otherwise happy with purchase

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: one of these fully charged is generally enough for a days use at work as an electrician depending on brightness setting but i have two of them so i never have to buy aaa batteries for my head torch which i use for work most days

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: recently purchased a preloved petzl actik that takes aaa batt  so was pleased it could allso take this rechargeable  battery that fits perfectly in compartment remember it fits petzl lights from  date is on all lights monthyr

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: great  made my petzl head lamp much brighter and more practical  i am sure the lumens quoted on the box was using this rather than aaas  dropped one star for the price when compared to other similar rechargeable battery packs eg lipo battery for a cannon eos which is a tenner

Name: petzl core rechargeable battery
Reviews: bought this battery  years ago and it has had a lot of everyday use just bought myself another

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: purchased this to help with house renovation worked perfectly so handy for various jobs such as taking paint lids off scraping plying pulling off cutting wedging limitless very inexpensive and worked perfectly great addition to my tool kit

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: a very strong knife easy to use with an exceptional design very easy to use and clean fits perfectly in your pocket purdy is at its best as always

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: incredibly useful tool but never actually used it for scraping paint or spreading fillerhowever for carpentry jobs this gets used for so much and pretty damn durable too

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: the media could not be loaded                                                                                    i was using it today for a first time and im very satisfied very good grip quality blade  i hit few nails scraping the plaster from the floor but absolutely no damage to the blade the handle is very comfy

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: everyone who does some diy around the house needs one of these this is well made and sturdy and helped me out in many cases eg fixing stairs prying out tiles scraping off silicone

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: excellent product would endorse

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: great tool use this a lot at work being a floor layer used to lift up old flooring scrap off old silicone scraping floors etc stands ups well to the work would defo recommend

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: fantastic tool its sharp versatile and very handy its a must for anyone that does upcycling or those that chose to renovate their home its a sharp tool so far i used it to score and take off wallpaper omg so easy flake off the paint putty the window panes applying wood putty clean up the wood from paint score the wood before plastering taking up the nails opening cans of paint digging out the paint from the screws painted over to remove them prying open painted over windows taking off the skirting boards  the list is endless i will keep it forever

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: really good handy for all jobs had a few but this one made much stronger it fill stronger to

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: this is ok but the scraper head is wider so less versatile than the smaller purdy painters tool

Name: purdy in premium multitool single unit
Reviews: fantastic tool its sharp versatile and very handy its a must for anyone that does upcycling or those that chose to renovate their home its a sharp tool so far i used it to score and take off wallpaper omg so easy flake off the paint putty the window panes applying wood putty clean up the wood from paint score the wood before plastering taking up the nails opening cans of paint digging out the paint from the screws painted over to remove them prying open painted over windows taking off the skirting boards  the list is endless i will keep it forever

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: the sheath is sturdy plastic and can be put on the other side as the handle the ceramic sharpener is easy to use give it a few strokes each side and the honing v is easy too you just dont have to pressjust the weight of it dragging havent sharpened knives in years and had all my grandfathers are now shaving sharp and each took me a few minutes

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: a handy little sharpener that works well when used properly seems specifically made for small blades tidy and easy to carry

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: nice wee addition to my kitsharpens wellgood price too

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: the good  i got one in the end sadly at the full  tag as the offer price meant you had to prove your age for some reason nope not for this product so i had to wait  its super useful for a light touch up in the field with the rounded edge you can get your mushroom knife or similar well edged and the groove is useful for the back edge of the point or a fishing hook its a touch up sharpener not a honing one  the dual end thing is ok but no neededthe bad   the price is to high they used to be well under  and offered at  the top that covers the little v shaped sharpener needs to fit better and with more of a detent so you can feel its home sadly it comes of if youre not careful attention to detail something lacking in most things these daysif youre going to sell a product at an elevated price the quality should be reflected in all the years ive been on amazon i seen maybe on or two star products and this is not one of them  as for the rating features of a product we dont need to it just confuses people and increases the ratingits good but not that good useful but not essential i like it i bought it

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: tried lots of knife sharpeners for pocket knives bushcraft  kitchen knives all of which i use most days some were good some a waste of money  alot of it as well came across a you tube review of this one which as it was victorinox got my interest bought  one for field use one for homesimple to use borderline idiot proof  have to say ive used them on many knives  every one has finished by being as sharp or sharper than newceramic part will only work on thinner bladed knives upto around mm dependent on grind but simple cheap lasts well good quality  always have one handy

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: very handy size excellent sharpener saves using the upturned bottom of a mug

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: sleek but practical design  works really well as long as used properly like most things really  easy to carry with good build quality  if youve never sharpened a blade before i recommend you check on youtube so you start off correctly  easy to carry into the field to sharpen your swiss army or most other knives to be honest

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: absolutely brilliant very easy to usejust ordered two more so i can keep one in the kitchen and one in my vanyou can sharpen at work in front of the telly up a mountain no messing with water or anything you can use it anywhere without a benchive used it to great effect on pen knives pocket knives kitchen knives sushi knives carving knives hunting knives cutlery steel carbon steel razor steel all no problem with excellent resultsfew tips its not a chefs steel dont try and use it like oneheres the biggie never use it with your hand in front of the blade sorry for shoutingjust flip the blade so the edge is away from you and hold the sharpener behind the bladepick your angle and sweep left and right like youre shading on a line with a pencildont saw across the blade always run along the blade left right handle to tip you dont need to do long full sweeps just keep it evenlike this its impossible to cut yourself or scratch the flat of the knifeas the edge apexes youll start pushing a burr over the apexkeep flipping sides and reducing pressure until the burr reduces to nothingif youre not getting a good edge you are either not properly apexed yet or youre using too much pressure and knackering up the apexthe last sweeps should feel like warm butter with a feather pressuretest the edge on a single sheet of paper thatll show you where you need to do more workscrub deposits off the sharpener on cardboard or a roll of paperif you want to polish or strop the edge afterwards use a leather belt for razor steel or leather with polishing compound on it for harder steelsyes you can do a faster better job with  worth of japanese whetstones but come on are you a sushi chef or do you just want your knives to work properly anyway this is much easier to use on smaller blades and doesnt make a mess

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: handy little sharpener with swiss army quality bought it for camping but find it useful in the kitchen as well you wont be sharpening a sword with it but for the average kitchen knife it is ideal

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
