Reviews: absolutely brilliant very easy to usejust ordered two more so i can keep one in the kitchen and one in my vanyou can sharpen at work in front of the telly up a mountain no messing with water or anything you can use it anywhere without a benchive used it to great effect on pen knives pocket knives kitchen knives sushi knives carving knives hunting knives cutlery steel carbon steel razor steel all no problem with excellent resultsfew tips its not a chefs steel dont try and use it like oneheres the biggie never use it with your hand in front of the blade sorry for shoutingjust flip the blade so the edge is away from you and hold the sharpener behind the bladepick your angle and sweep left and right like youre shading on a line with a pencildont saw across the blade always run along the blade left right handle to tip you dont need to do long full sweeps just keep it evenlike this its impossible to cut yourself or scratch the flat of the knifeas the edge apexes youll start pushing a burr over the apexkeep flipping sides and reducing pressure until the burr reduces to nothingif youre not getting a good edge you are either not properly apexed yet or youre using too much pressure and knackering up the apexthe last sweeps should feel like warm butter with a feather pressuretest the edge on a single sheet of paper thatll show you where you need to do more workscrub deposits off the sharpener on cardboard or a roll of paperif you want to polish or strop the edge afterwards use a leather belt for razor steel or leather with polishing compound on it for harder steelsyes you can do a faster better job with  worth of japanese whetstones but come on are you a sushi chef or do you just want your knives to work properly anyway this is much easier to use on smaller blades and doesnt make a mess

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: handy little sharpener with swiss army quality bought it for camping but find it useful in the kitchen as well you wont be sharpening a sword with it but for the average kitchen knife it is ideal

Name: victorinox swiss army knife sharpener dual knife sharpener professional swiss made portable blackred
Reviews: great product and quick delivery

Name: throw throw burrito card game by exploding kittens  a dodgeball card game  fun family card games for adults teens  kids  players
Reviews: this game is absolutely bonkers  and a lot of fun its beautifully presented  the game comes in a nicely made rigid storage box that should last well if im being really critical it is a bit overpackaged although most of the internal packaging barring cellulose wrapping around two decks of cards is made from paper or card the avocados are really cute with friendly smiling faces and slightly bugging eyes there are decent elements of realism too the avocado halves are pretty much the right size for a real avocado and one half has the stone in it whilst the other has a hole the two would fit together neatly were it not for their eyes the avocados are designed to be thrown at other players theyre made from coated foam and are soft squishy and completely safe far less stingy than ball pit play balls can bethe game itself is total pandemonium in which pretty much everything you know and expect from the structuring a boardcard game gets thrown out the window dealing is haphazard as is game play the rule booklet encourages you to watch a video instead of reading the rules there are no clear turns the game is designed to create a mess of cards dumped in other players draw pots instead of neat structured piles its fast furious hilarious and you get to repeatedly throw squishy toy avocados at people loved ittheres a clever bit of marketing involved too the game is a sequel to throw throw burrito and includes an addon extension game that can only be played in conjunction with the burrito game the manufacturers make this hard to ignore theres a paper envelope of cards that youre instructed not to open as it contains an expansion that can only be used in combination with throw throw burritio im contrary enough to have followed the instructions here and have not opened the envelope at time of writing we do not own throw throw burrito  and unless one of our friends owns a set we can borrow i think its safe to say that by christmas we will have invested in the original game because i think this will be a lot of fun if a family christmas is back on the cards in

Name: throw throw burrito card game by exploding kittens  a dodgeball card game  fun family card games for adults teens  kids  players
Reviews: very easy to play and very funny

Name: throw throw burrito card game by exploding kittens  a dodgeball card game  fun family card games for adults teens  kids  players
Reviews: present good value for money as got in black friday deal good quality product and kids loved it

Name: throw throw burrito card game by exploding kittens  a dodgeball card game  fun family card games for adults teens  kids  players
Reviews: this review is based on two adults and two  yr olds playing  we found the rules easy to pick up after a couple of read throughs of the instructions its a bit like a fast paced game of go fish with added chaos everyone enjoyed the game  including the adult whod had to have their arm twisted to join in there were soon shrieks of laughter from everyone as the shouts of burrito war etc went out and we scrambled to hurl our missiles at each other very soft dont hurt and dive for cover the games dont last long so you dont have to commit to hours if you dont feel like it but equally you can keep playing for as long as the fun lasts if you dont want an opportunity to throw things at your family without reproach this probably isnt for you if you like a laugh it probably is

Name: throw throw burrito card game by exploding kittens  a dodgeball card game  fun family card games for adults teens  kids  players
Reviews: this game apparently has some rules and there may be a strategyhowever in practice you just slam cards down as fast as you can until you or someone else yells something and then you throw a burrito at them or at someone else or you command others to throw burritos at each othersometimes you run around a whole building trying to either throw or evade a burrito sometimes you just pray to have a burrito slammed into your face and be done with ityou can console yourself from the trauma by using resting burritos as useful stress relief toys

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: a near miss of a game the concept is great the game needs ro come with blindfolds the reality is regardless its slightly too easy to figure out who is the bad wombat buy thus exclusively to terrorise your children for twenty minutes before playing the burrito or avocado game instead

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: the media could not be loaded                                                                                    we had a hilarious half and hour or so playing this the other night unfortunately the friends i was playing it with didnt want to be in a video so i could not get any actual game play in this review video im afraid  i have done a quick video to show you whats in the box and for me the comic booklet that comes with it is a very close second to the actual game and great in its own rightthe idea of the game is to cover your eyes with one hand whilst trying to build blocks in sequential order with the other well most of you are there is an evil wombat who is trying to destroy all your towers it is very easily as hard as it sounds and then some after you get to grips with the basic game there is other power card that can be incorporated into the game too ive done a quick video showing you whats actually in the box and i will try and get a quick vid of some game play the next time i find some players who are less camera shy but all i can say is its great fun and i can see it being an essential family game as well as a brilliant ice breaker to take to university really well priced at  all hail the wicked wombat

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: amazing game absolutely hilarious and unusual and was good for all ages the adults very much enjoyed

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: hand to hand wombat is a really great game we played this as a family of all ages at christmas it was really easy to set up and understand at first from the description is seemed like it would be over really quickly and not much fun but actually it was the best game we played there were lots of laughs had throughout

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: we are big fans of the exploding kittens games and have bought and enjoyed all the others we were really looking forward to venturing into wombats for the first time but the game was used nly once and then has never been picked to play on family nights again

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players
Reviews: this is a really quick and simple party game to play it suggests being for  players  people cant play the game together however more than  could play it might just get a little chaoticat the start of the game youre all assigned the role of either a good wombat or a bad wombat if youre a good wombat you try to build the towers and get points at the end of the round if youve completed two or more the bad wombats score points by ensuring that only one tower or less have been completed by the end of the round youre team wins when you reach  pointshow dont you know who is who the building and knocking down is done with your eyes closed or blindfoldedtheres also a definite among us vibe involved in trying to find out who the imposter like bad wombats areso a fun dexterity party game for multiple people with no real age limit required as anyone can understand the principal of being good or bad and can be shown the cards so even if they cant read they know which role they areits not cheap for a board game but equally its not expensive either and is pretty averagely pricedthe components are plastic but seem sturdy enough to be up to the job and not likely to breakhappy to recommend

Name: exploding kittens hand to hand wombat card game fun family card games for adults teens  kids  fun party games  players

Reviews: the media could not be loaded                                                                                    we had a hilarious half and hour or so playing this the other night unfortunately the friends i was playing it with didnt want to be in a video so i could not get any actual game play in this review video im afraid  i have done a quick video to show you whats in the box and for me the comic booklet that comes with it is a very close second to the actual game and great in its own rightthe idea of the game is to cover your eyes with one hand whilst trying to build blocks in sequential order with the other well most of you are there is an evil wombat who is trying to destroy all your towers it is very easily as hard as it sounds and then some after you get to grips with the basic game there is other power card that can be incorporated into the game too ive done a quick video showing you whats actually in the box and i will try and get a quick vid of some game play the next time i find some players who are less camera shy but all i can say is its great fun and i can see it being an essential family game as well as a brilliant ice breaker to take to university really well priced at  all hail the wicked wombat

Name: mattel games uno classic card game for kids and adults for family game night use as a travel game or engaging gift for kids  to  players ages  and up w
Reviewers_name: as described would like an option to choose the colour of gel balls you get though
Reviews: having recently introduced the classic uno card game by mattel to my yearold ive been reminded of the sheer joy and excitement that this game brings to the table right from the vibrant colours to the simpletograsp numbers every aspect of this game has been designed with the player in mind engaging for all ages although we got this for our young one its not just a hit with him family members of all ages from grandparents to uncles and aunts have been drawn into the uno vortex making our family gatherings a lot more lively and competitive educational yet fun beyond the laughs and the playful banter its been a delight to see my yearold hone his colour and number matching skills what a fantastic way to subtly integrate learning with fun quality of cards the card quality is topnotch durable enough to withstand the occasional spill and rigorous play thats inevitable with children around travelfriendly its compact size makes it easy to carry around ensuring we have a trusty game on hand for any unplanned moments or while travellingone minor point of advice for those playing with younger kids make sure you explain the action cards skip reverse etc a couple of times as they might be a tad confusing initially but once they get the hang of it theres no stopping the uno funin conclusion mattels uno is not just a card game its a bridge across generations ensuring countless hours of family bonding and laughter highly recommended for everyone and especially if you have youngsters in the house

Name: mattel games uno classic card game for kids and adults for family game night use as a travel game or engaging gift for kids  to  players ages  and up w
Reviewers_name: as described would like an option to choose the colour of gel balls you get though
Reviews: having recently introduced the classic uno card game by mattel to my yearold ive been reminded of the sheer joy and excitement that this game brings to the table right from the vibrant colours to the simpletograsp numbers every aspect of this game has been designed with the player in mind engaging for all ages although we got this for our young one its not just a hit with him family members of all ages from grandparents to uncles and aunts have been drawn into the uno vortex making our family gatherings a lot more lively and competitive educational yet fun beyond the laughs and the playful banter its been a delight to see my yearold hone his colour and number matching skills what a fantastic way to subtly integrate learning with fun quality of cards the card quality is topnotch durable enough to withstand the occasional spill and rigorous play thats inevitable with children around travelfriendly its compact size makes it easy to carry around ensuring we have a trusty game on hand for any unplanned moments or while travellingone minor point of advice for those playing with younger kids make sure you explain the action cards skip reverse etc a couple of times as they might be a tad confusing initially but once they get the hang of it theres no stopping the uno funin conclusion mattels uno is not just a card game its a bridge across generations ensuring countless hours of family bonding and laughter highly recommended for everyone and especially if you have youngsters in the house

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: we recently had an unforgettable game night with ginger foxs were all gonna die hilarious party game for adults and it left us roaring with laughter from start to finish this game absolutely deserves a sparkling  out of  stars for the endless giggles and pure entertainment it brought to our gatheringfirst and foremost the concept of the game is simply genius the dark humor and witty prompts had us in stitches right from the beginning we found ourselves engaged in a flurry of hilariously absurd scenarios and answering outrageous questions the game brilliantly taps into our sense of humor and thrives on the unexpected delivering nonstop laughter that can brighten up any gatheringfurthermore the games unique combination of strategy and humor kept us on our toes throughout the strategy element adds an additional layer of excitement and competitiveness making each round more thrilling and unpredictable its not just about having a good laugh but also about outsmarting your opponents and strategically navigating through the games twists and turnsthe quality of the game components is also worth mentioning the cards are durably made and the illustrations are cleverly designed the writing on the cards is hilarious and ensures that every draw is a surprise waiting to be unveiled the game rules are easy to follow allowing us to dive right into the fun without any confusion or delaysall in all ginger foxs were all gonna die party game is an absolute riot our game night was filled with uncontrollable laughter and we cannot recommend this game enough for a memorable and laughterfilled gathering with friends if youre looking to add a dose of hilarity to your next game night this game is an absolute musthave prepare to laugh until it hurts

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: this is a game aimed at adults or at least over s if youve got people around then this game is absolutely hilarious and relies on innuendo and simplicitydeal out all the cards to everyone that is playing you then look through your cards and take turns at finding pairs and then shout them out and place then face up on the table then you take turns at going around the table to ask people if they have the other card to the one you might need to make a pairthe aim of the game is to avoid having the dont be a dik dik card in your possession at the end whereby the only solution is to play dont be a dik dik roulette and take cards off the other remaining playerits a great game for camping journeys parties and nights in

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: after several rounds of playing the ginger fox dont be a dik dik card game im ready to give it a hearty star review this game has been a source of much laughter and amusement with a few caveatsthe games humor is its biggest draw its cheeky playful and often outright hilarious the first game night with this card deck was an absolute riot with everyone engaged and enjoying the novelty and wit of each card the design and quality of the cards are excellent contributing to an enjoyable gaming experiencereplayability is a strong point of dont be a dik dik you can bring it out on multiple occasions and its easy to get into the fun without lengthy explanations or setups its a great icebreaker and a fantastic way to inject some lightheartedness into an eveninghowever the humor while a significant plus does tend to lose a bit of its charm after the first playthrough the surprise element of the jokes and scenarios diminishes which is common with humorcentered games while it remains enjoyable the repeat rounds arent quite as uproarious as the initial experiencealso its worth noting the games content leans towards adult humor its perfect for a night in with friends but might raise a few eyebrows in more conservative or familyoriented gatherings its all about knowing your audience with this onedespite this the games quality ease of play and the sheer fun factor keep it high on my list dont be a dik dik is durable wellcrafted and sure to bring laughter even if its a bit less surprising after the first roundin conclusion the ginger fox dont be a dik dik card game is a fantastic choice for those looking for an entertaining adultthemed game its a solid star game that promises and delivers many fun evenings even if the humor becomes slightly more familiar over time its a staple for any game night thats not afraid of a little playful cheekiness

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: we recently had an unforgettable game night with ginger foxs were all gonna die hilarious party game for adults and it left us roaring with laughter from start to finish this game absolutely deserves a sparkling  out of  stars for the endless giggles and pure entertainment it brought to our gatheringfirst and foremost the concept of the game is simply genius the dark humor and witty prompts had us in stitches right from the beginning we found ourselves engaged in a flurry of hilariously absurd scenarios and answering outrageous questions the game brilliantly taps into our sense of humor and thrives on the unexpected delivering nonstop laughter that can brighten up any gatheringfurthermore the games unique combination of strategy and humor kept us on our toes throughout the strategy element adds an additional layer of excitement and competitiveness making each round more thrilling and unpredictable its not just about having a good laugh but also about outsmarting your opponents and strategically navigating through the games twists and turnsthe quality of the game components is also worth mentioning the cards are durably made and the illustrations are cleverly designed the writing on the cards is hilarious and ensures that every draw is a surprise waiting to be unveiled the game rules are easy to follow allowing us to dive right into the fun without any confusion or delaysall in all ginger foxs were all gonna die party game is an absolute riot our game night was filled with uncontrollable laughter and we cannot recommend this game enough for a memorable and laughterfilled gathering with friends if youre looking to add a dose of hilarity to your next game night this game is an absolute musthave prepare to laugh until it hurts

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: this is a game aimed at adults or at least over s if youve got people around then this game is absolutely hilarious and relies on innuendo and simplicitydeal out all the cards to everyone that is playing you then look through your cards and take turns at finding pairs and then shout them out and place then face up on the table then you take turns at going around the table to ask people if they have the other card to the one you might need to make a pairthe aim of the game is to avoid having the dont be a dik dik card in your possession at the end whereby the only solution is to play dont be a dik dik roulette and take cards off the other remaining playerits a great game for camping journeys parties and nights in

Name: ginger fox calm your birds silly card game  laughoutloud adult fun with friends at party games night  matching pairs play for grownups based on funny nature names   players aged  years
Reviews: after several rounds of playing the ginger fox dont be a dik dik card game im ready to give it a hearty star review this game has been a source of much laughter and amusement with a few caveatsthe games humor is its biggest draw its cheeky playful and often outright hilarious the first game night with this card deck was an absolute riot with everyone engaged and enjoying the novelty and wit of each card the design and quality of the cards are excellent contributing to an enjoyable gaming experiencereplayability is a strong point of dont be a dik dik you can bring it out on multiple occasions and its easy to get into the fun without lengthy explanations or setups its a great icebreaker and a fantastic way to inject some lightheartedness into an eveninghowever the humor while a significant plus does tend to lose a bit of its charm after the first playthrough the surprise element of the jokes and scenarios diminishes which is common with humorcentered games while it remains enjoyable the repeat rounds arent quite as uproarious as the initial experiencealso its worth noting the games content leans towards adult humor its perfect for a night in with friends but might raise a few eyebrows in more conservative or familyoriented gatherings its all about knowing your audience with this onedespite this the games quality ease of play and the sheer fun factor keep it high on my list dont be a dik dik is durable wellcrafted and sure to bring laughter even if its a bit less surprising after the first roundin conclusion the ginger fox dont be a dik dik card game is a fantastic choice for those looking for an entertaining adultthemed game its a solid star game that promises and delivers many fun evenings even if the humor becomes slightly more familiar over time its a staple for any game night thats not afraid of a little playful cheekiness

Name: uno all wild card game with  cards gift for kid family  adult game night for players  years  older hhl
Reviews: hey you wild card enthusiasts i stumbled upon the uno all wild card game and let me tell you my life took a turn more unexpected than a surprise party at an introverts houseso there i am unboxing this deck of unlimited chaos its like opening pandoras box but instead of unleashing doom i get  cards of pure unpredictability i thought great a family game night staple little did i know its more like a wild night in vegasthe key feature every card is a wild card i felt like a wizard holding a deck of magical mischief no matching colors or numbers  its like uno took a walk on the wild side and im the tour guide through chaosnow picture this date night i thought lets spice things up with uno all wild turns out the game is more unpredictable than my dating history the wild forced swap card lets just say its not a recommended icebreakerfamily game night with parents was another adventure the wild targeted draw  card became a tool for settling old scores mom targeted dad dad retaliated suddenly im a referee in a domestic uno disputetook it to work thinking its a teambuilding exercise boss loved the wild skip  card so much he skipped me right out of the company fired for playing uno but hey worth itexperimented with a child  easy right wrong kids are tactical geniuses the moment they learned about the wild draw  they used it strategically now i owe a yearold five ice creamsand pets tried playing with a goldfish turns out theyre not great at holding cards my living room turned into a fishy uno battlefield lets just say operation fishdraw didnt go swimminglybad feature alert the wild swap hands used it with my cousin and now i know more about his life choices than i ever wanted turns out some secrets should stay in the deckquality of life upgrade absolutely my social calendar is busier than ever why because uno all wild has made me the neighborhood uno guru people come for the game stay for the hilarityas for attractiveness to women lets just say nothing says charm like playing a wild reverse card when she expects a compliment who knew uno could be a love potionin conclusion uno all wild is not just a card game its a wild ride through unexpected scenarios if your life needs a dash of chaos and a sprinkle of laughter this deck is your golden ticketplease appreciate this review with a chuckle and consider inviting uno all wild to your next game night your positive feedback might just fund my uno addiction

Name: uno all wild card game with  cards gift for kid family  adult game night for players  years  older hhl
Reviews: brilliant game really good for families highly recommended

Name: uno all wild card game with  cards gift for kid family  adult game night for players  years  older hhl
Reviews: arrived on time and no damage however the game itself isnt the best becomes very confusing and you dont get the good game of uno like you do with the normal game played a few times but always end up going back to the original

Name: uno all wild card game with  cards gift for kid family  adult game night for players  years  older hhl
Reviews: each variation gives lots of game play in different ways each proves to be fun so georgia has taken to collecting each uno game available

Name: uno all wild card game with  cards gift for kid family  adult game night for players  years  older hhl
Reviews: i bought this game as a gift for my family and we had a blast playing it its basically uno with all wild cards which means you can change the color or make someone draw cards at any time the game also comes with erasable wild cards that you can customize with your own rules for added excitement we had some hilarious moments with these cards like making someone sing a song or do a dancethe game is easy to learn and play and its suitable for ages  and up its great for family nights parties or just passing the time the cards are good quality and durable and they come in a nice box thats easy to storethe only downside i can think of is that the game can get chaotic and unpredictable which might not be everyones cup of tea some people might prefer the original uno with more structure and strategy also some of the erasable wild cards were hard to write on or erase completelyoverall i think this is a fun and creative variation of uno that adds more spice and laughter to the game if youre looking for something different and exciting to play with your friends or family i recommend giving this game a try

Reviews: i bought this game as a gift for my family and we had a blast playing it its basically uno with all wild cards which means you can change the color or make someone draw cards at any time the game also comes with erasable wild cards that you can customize with your own rules for added excitement we had some hilarious moments with these cards like making someone sing a song or do a dancethe game is easy to learn and play and its suitable for ages  and up its great for family nights parties or just passing the time the cards are good quality and durable and they come in a nice box thats easy to storethe only downside i can think of is that the game can get chaotic and unpredictable which might not be everyones cup of tea some people might prefer the original uno with more structure and strategy also some of the erasable wild cards were hard to write on or erase completelyoverall i think this is a fun and creative variation of uno that adds more spice and laughter to the game if youre looking for something different and exciting to play with your friends or family i recommend giving this game a try

my social calendar is busier than ever why because uno all wild has made me the neighborhood uno guru people come for the game stay for the hilarityas for attractiveness to women lets just say nothing says charm like playing a wild reverse card when she expects a compliment who knew uno could be a love potionin conclusion uno all wild is not just a card game its a wild ride through unexpected scenarios if your life needs a dash of chaos and a sprinkle of laughter this deck is your golden ticketplease appreciate this review with a chuckle and consider inviting uno all wild to your next game night your positive feedback might just fund my uno addiction

Reviews: i bought this game as a gift for my family and we had a blast playing it its basically uno with all wild cards which means you can change the color or make someone draw cards at any time the game also comes with erasable wild cards that you can customize with your own rules for added excitement we had some hilarious moments with these cards like making someone sing a song or do a dancethe game is easy to learn and play and its suitable for ages  and up its great for family nights parties or just passing the time the cards are good quality and durable and they come in a nice box thats easy to storethe only downside i can think of is that the game can get chaotic and unpredictable which might not be everyones cup of tea some people might prefer the original uno with more structure and strategy also some of the erasable wild cards were hard to write on or erase completelyoverall i think this is a fun and creative variation of uno that adds more spice and laughter to the game if youre looking for something different and exciting to play with your friends or family i recommend giving this game a try

Name: mattel games uno flip family card game for adults teens  kids doublesided deck with special flip card  cards  year old and up gdr
Reviews: ladies and gentlemen i have discovered a game that will not only test your friendships but also your ability to control your emotions its called uno flip and trust me its a rollercoaster ride for your sanityat first glance you might think oh its just uno with a little twist well my friends its more than a twist  its like uno went on a wild bender and woke up on the wrong side of the bedso heres how it goes you start with a deck of cards thats already making you question your life choices but wait theres more theres a special flip card and its like the pandoras box of uno when that card hits the table all hell breaks looseimagine this youre just one card away from victory youre feeling cocky and then someone drops that dreaded flip card suddenly youre in an alternate uno dimension where everything is upside down and youre drowning in cards its like a card game version of inceptionnow lets talk about the chaos that unfolds when youre playing with friends uno flip takes your friendships and puts them in a blender youll see your closest pals turn into devious masterminds plotting your downfall with every flip ive seen lifelong friendships crumble over a game of uno flip and let me tell you its worth every minutebut heres the best part  the crazy ideas on how to use this game you can use the cards to build a house of cards and then dramatically flip the table just like a movie villain or turn it into a highstakes drinking game where every flip card means a shot just dont blame me for the hangoverin conclusion uno flip is not just a card game its a test of your patience your friendships and your ability to embrace chaos its like the game of thrones of card games  expect betrayal unexpected twists and a lot of shouting so if youre ready for the most intense uno experience of your life grab a deck and may the flips be ever in your favor

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: cant believe how much fun this was and the holographic cards are a really nice touch

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: this is a fun little card game my  year old loves the song so i got this for him for a christmas present we are serious board gamers and hes used to playing games with more complex rules worker placement engine builders etc but i thought that this would be a nice short easy to play game its pretty fun as weve already played it  times in one sitting it is a take that game with player elimination so for me it was more fun with just  players however its not as mean as munchkin and the lenticular cards are darkly humorous as you kill off the beans my son loves the cartoon illustrations and its great to pick up and play for a few minutes to get your kid off devices the photo shows the least gruesome you died card i could find but its cartoon humour with beans instead of people so we like it well be keeping and playing this one as our nongamer friends will find the rules easy and the illustrations are great also it plays up to  people so will work for a larger group the lenticular cards do warp over time but apparently thats not unusual and doesnt affect gameplay the quality is lovely with linen finish on the playing cards a custom die amd moulded insert which was a nice surprise

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: didnt love it found it quite boring rules had to be explained repeatedly until i yearned to just smash my head into the table

Reviews: juego divertido y de muy buena calidad

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: love the quality of these cards a great fun game that doesnt take long to play but we always want to have another round plus important life skills on how not to die in dumb ways so educational

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: ok so for backgroundour family looks ves to play fallguys and they are beans so that was an automatic good start for this game it is really simple to play and goes pretty quick once you understand the rules its easy for pretty much anyone to play we have an autistic child and a brain injured adult in our family and they got the hang of it after a round of two we all played nice for the first couple roundsthen it was no hold up ng back trying to see which bean you could get out cute and funny for a family or gathering that has a sense of humor

Reviews: this is a fun little card game my  year old loves the song so i got this for him for a christmas present we are serious board gamers and hes used to playing games with more complex rules worker placement engine builders etc but i thought that this would be a nice short easy to play game its pretty fun as weve already played it  times in one sitting it is a take that game with player elimination so for me it was more fun with just  players however its not as mean as munchkin and the lenticular cards are darkly humorous as you kill off the beans my son loves the cartoon illustrations and its great to pick up and play for a few minutes to get your kid off devices the photo shows the least gruesome you died card i could find but its cartoon humour with beans instead of people so we like it well be keeping and playing this one as our nongamer friends will find the rules easy and the illustrations are great also it plays up to  people so will work for a larger group the lenticular cards do warp over time but apparently thats not unusual and doesnt affect gameplay the quality is lovely with linen finish on the playing cards a custom die amd moulded insert which was a nice surprise

Name: dumb ways to die card game based on the viral video card games for adults  party games  adult games  fun games for families  kids ages  and up
Reviews: this is a fun little card game my  year old loves the song so i got this for him for a christmas present we are serious board gamers and hes used to playing games with more complex rules worker placement engine builders etc but i thought that this would be a nice short easy to play game its pretty fun as weve already played it  times in one sitting it is a take that game with player elimination so for me it was more fun with just  players however its not as mean as munchkin and the lenticular cards are darkly humorous as you kill off the beans my son loves the cartoon illustrations and its great to pick up and play for a few minutes to get your kid off devices the photo shows the least gruesome you died card i could find but its cartoon humour with beans instead of people so we like it well be keeping and playing this one as our nongamer friends will find the rules easy and the illustrations are great also it plays up to  people so will work for a larger group the lenticular cards do warp over time but apparently thats not unusual and doesnt affect gameplay the quality is lovely with linen finish on the playing cards a custom die amd moulded insert which was a nice surprise
